['', 'The Ideal Candidate Is', 'Bachelor’s Degree plus 2 years of experience in data analytics in the workplace, or Master’s Degree plus 1 year in data analytics in the workplace, or PhD', 'At least 1 year of experience with machine learning', ' Master’s Degree in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) At least 1 year working in financial, healthcare, or collections services At least 1 year of experience working with AWS At least 2 years’ experience in Spark/Databricks/Scala or R At least 2 years’ experience with machine learning At least 3 years’ experience with SQL ', 'At least 2 years’ experience in Spark/Databricks/Scala or R', 'Technical. You have hands-on experience developing data science solutions using open-source tools and cloud computing platforms.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'You have built machine learning models through all phases of development, from design through training, evaluation, validation, and implementation and can explain your decisions in a simple and concise way to non-technical expects,', 'At least 1 year of experience with relational databases', 'A big data wrangler. You have the skills to retrieve, combine, and analyze data from a variety of sources and structures, preferably using Spark and other open source technologies. Technical. You’ve worked with open-source languages, you know how to develop reusable code, and you are passionate about continuing to improve. You have hands-on experience developing data science solutions using open-source tools and cloud computing platforms. Statistically-minded. You’ve built models, validated them, and monitored them post-deployment. You know how to interpret a ROC curve and partial dependence plots. You have experience with multivariate linear and nonlinear models as well as unsupervised approaches including clustering, classification, and anomaly detection. Forward-thinking. You know how to promote a culture of technical excellence and look for opportunities to reuse robust, resilient solutions wherever possible. ', ' You have built machine learning models through all phases of development, from design through training, evaluation, validation, and implementation and can explain your decisions in a simple and concise way to non-technical expects, You know how to strike the right balance between sharing your expertise and listening to others’ ideas, and You love to learn how to apply cutting edge technologies in a way that drives value for business decisions and can leverage several technologies and languages — SQL, R, AWS, Spark, and more — to reveal the insights hidden within huge volumes of transaction data, ', 'This Role Is For You If', 'Master’s Degree in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics) plus 3 years of experience in data analytics, or PhD in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics)', 'Preferred Qualifications']

['', 'Bonus', 'Interact with multiple teams.', 'Make bold decisions', 'Competitive salary and stock options.', 'Data Scientist | Acorns', 'With benevolence and courage, we look after the financial best interests of the up-and-coming; beginning with the empowering step of micro-investing.\xa0', 'Strong SQL abilities and experience with massive relational database systems.', 'Within 1 month, you will:', 'Knowledge of scalable and efficient methods for large scale data analysis and model development.', 'Lead with heartMake bold decisionsAlways build trustNever stop growingFind a way', 'Hunger for impact, drive, and creativity', 'Find a way', 'At Acorns, Data Scientists have broad latitude around data and you will collaborate with groups including Analytics, Engineering, Product Management, Marketing, Operations, Risk, and Business Development.', 'BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent experience.', 'Background in data mining, machine learning, statistical analysis, or mathematical modeling, with experience deploying models in a production environment.', 'What you will bring to Acorns:', 'Have established architecture and implementation for an intelligence-driven product feature in a data-rich environment.', 'Values:', 'This role has the option to be remote or based in our Irvine or New York offices.', 'What we offer:', 'Always build trust', 'Discover new opportunities to apply data science concepts to the portfolio of products.', 'Requirements:', 'Partnered with Engineering teams to deliver data science solutions into the product with proper API design.', 'Competitive salary and stock options.A comprehensive benefits package to meet the needs of you and your family.Flexible paid time off.Numerous career possibilities that allow you to grow with Acorns.Talented and motivated team members who care deeply about one another, our mission and our customers.The rare opportunity to create a new world. We inspire one another every day to do meaningful work that solves big societal challenges.', 'Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion:', 'Lead with heart', 'BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent experience.3-4+ years of experience in working with noisy real-world structured and semi-structured data.Python or Scala, with related statistical and machine learning packages.Background in data mining, machine learning, statistical analysis, or mathematical modeling, with experience deploying models in a production environment.Experience with A/B testing methodologies and experiments.Hunger for impact, drive, and creativityStrong SQL abilities and experience with massive relational database systems.Able to take a complex, ambiguous topic and turn it into a defined problem that answers the business question we are trying to solve.Excellent communication skills\xa0', 'Within 3 months, you will:', 'Made production quality code commits into the team’s repository.', 'Able to take a complex, ambiguous topic and turn it into a defined problem that answers the business question we are trying to solve.', 'Talented and motivated team members who care deeply about one another, our mission and our customers.', 'About Acorns:', 'Pride in your work', 'Empathy for our customers’ financial situations and the desire to help our customers in need of personalized products and services.', 'Never stop growing', 'Collaborated with the Product Management team to plan projects and recommend areas for the next generation of Acorns products.', 'Mission:', 'Optimistic about the potential of societal change.', "At Acorns, we're building a financial wellness system that enables everyday Americans to save and invest every day. We are transforming the category and recruiting a team that is relentless at fulfilling our mission. The Acorns team comes together every day to deliver a revolutionary product to its customers, the up-and-coming. If you thrive in an environment where you can push yourself beyond all previous thresholds of possibility, come join us at Acorns.", 'An ability to explain complex problems in a simple way.', 'Collaborated with the Product Management team to plan projects and recommend areas for the next generation of Acorns products.Partnered with Engineering teams to deliver data science solutions into the product with proper API design.Be able to responsibly represent the Data Science team with other departments.', "You are not expected to have experience with all the listed requirements. If you feel passionately about Acorns' mission, vision and values, please apply.\xa0", 'Within 6 months, you will:', 'Python or Scala, with related statistical and machine learning packages.', 'Learn Acorns products, data warehouse, and how data fits into the products.Discover new opportunities to apply data science concepts to the portfolio of products.Present findings to the Data Science team members.Interact with multiple teams.', 'Proposed novel ML research directions that will eventually power new products.', "A belief that your work is tied to your life's mission.", 'The Acorns Data Science group is focused on solving problems that directly affect customers, including recommendation engines, fraud prevention, and customer intention inference. But these aren’t Kaggle-type problems; we operate with urgency and often with imperfect data. We know that solving problems with data is an art and a science. Data Scientists at Acorns are as good at communicating and collaborating as they are at building models and writing code.', 'Knowledge of basic macroeconomic concepts.', 'Numerous career possibilities that allow you to grow with Acorns.', 'Experience writing production quality, version-controlled code.', 'Be able to responsibly represent the Data Science team with other departments.', 'Flexible paid time off.', 'Present findings to the Data Science team members.', 'Acorns is actively seeking a motivated, detail-oriented, and solution-focused Data Scientist. This position will reside in the Data Science group, which serves as the central data science team for the company. The team is responsible for developing and using mathematical modeling, data mining, and machine learning techniques to be agents for good by helping look after the financial best interests of the up-and-coming.', 'Empathy for our customers’ financial situations and the desire to help our customers in need of personalized products and services.The ability to uphold the values of transparency, honesty, and support for the team.An ability to explain complex problems in a simple way.Capability to build algorithms that touch statistics and machine learning.Knowledge of scalable and efficient methods for large scale data analysis and model development.Pride in your work', 'The rare opportunity to create a new world. We inspire one another every day to do meaningful work that solves big societal challenges.', 'The ability to uphold the values of transparency, honesty, and support for the team.', 'Capability to build algorithms that touch statistics and machine learning.', 'MS or Ph.D. in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, Physics, Engineering or another quantitative field.\xa0', "Acorns is the leading micro-investing app in the U.S. It allows users to round up their daily purchases and automatically Invest the Change® into a low-cost, diversified portfolio of exchange-traded funds offered by some of the world's top asset managers (including Vanguard and BlackRock). Founded in Newport Beach, Calif., by father and son team Walter and Jeff Cruttenden, Acorns provides a simple entry-point using the Acorns app on iPhone or Android. Customers accumulate fractional shares in one of five portfolios constructed by world-renowned Nobel Laureate economist Dr. Harry Markowitz. Acorns' smart portfolio algorithms automatically work in the background of life, helping users build wealth naturally, pennies at a time. From Acorns mighty oaks do grow.", 'Acorns believes diversity, equity and inclusion are fundamental obligations that strengthen our team. We need a diverse, multi-disciplinary team to build a meaningful company and culture.\xa0', 'A comprehensive benefits package to meet the needs of you and your family.', 'Learn Acorns products, data warehouse, and how data fits into the products.', '3-4+ years of experience in working with noisy real-world structured and semi-structured data.', 'Have established architecture and implementation for an intelligence-driven product feature in a data-rich environment.Made production quality code commits into the team’s repository.Contributed to the broader team’s success by offering ideas and constructive feedback to other team member’s projects.Proposed novel ML research directions that will eventually power new products.', "MS or Ph.D. in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, Physics, Engineering or another quantitative field.\xa0Experience writing production quality, version-controlled code.Knowledge of basic macroeconomic concepts.A belief that your work is tied to your life's mission.Optimistic about the potential of societal change.", 'Excellent communication skills\xa0', 'Experience with A/B testing methodologies and experiments.', 'Contributed to the broader team’s success by offering ideas and constructive feedback to other team member’s projects.']

['', 'Company Description:', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Responsibilities:', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'General Requirements:', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. ['', 'Company Description:', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Responsibilities:', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests, connecting them with others who share those interests, and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'General Requirements:', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. As our second full-time Data team member, you’ll have an opportunity to work cross-functionally with teammates from Operations, Product, Marketing, and other internal teams as they tackle a variety of challenges and opportunities. You’ll help shape our strategy by sharing key insights, digging into some of our most pressing problems, and finding creative ways to use data to improve our products and services.', 'Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0', 'Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0', 'Job Description:', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0', 'Required Skills: SQL, Python, R, data visualization tools', 'Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0', 'Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0']

['', ' · Experience owning deliverables for machine learning, analytics or large-scale data-driven product features', '· Excellent programming skills (Java/Python/R/SaS) and understanding of computational complexity and data structures', '· Excellent understanding of ML, NLP, Deep Learning, and statistical methodologies', ' · Strong communication and collaboration skills, with a proven ability to work across functions and influence senior leaders', 'We are seeking an experienced principal-level applied scientist to lead large scale, complex data science projects. You will work closely with product managers and business partners across the company to identify opportunities to innovate and build game-changing product features using Machine Learning, Information Retrieval, NLP and Predictive Analytics. You will own one or more research areas, represent the team in executive-level meetings, mentor other scientists and engineers in the team, and lead the research and delivery of models in close collaboration with scientists and engineers. ', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:', 'The right candidate will have a deep technical background along with mentorship and leadership experience, and a proven track record of proposing innovative features and platforms, securing funding for their ideas, and delivering significant, quantifiable business impact. The candidate will have exceptional interpersonal and negotiation skills, ability to earn trust of others, and ability to move fast and make effective decisions in the presence of significant ambiguity.', 'Clarivate Analytics clients are the trailblazers and risk takers who come up with life-changing ideas. We’re looking for our own trailblazers to help us keep providing clients some of the world’s most trusted brands, spanning scientific and academic research, patent analytics, pharmaceutical and biotech intelligence and IP management.', ' .\xa0Familiarity with academic research, patents, trademarks or life sciences data sets', '· Proven track record of innovating on behalf of customers and using metrics to prove new ideas and to drive prioritization and funding decisions ', ' .\xa0Experience working in agile enabled teams', ' .\xa0Experience with search engines, classification algorithms, recommendation systems, and relevance evaluation methodologies a plus', '\xa0', '· Excellent analytical and quantitative skills and strong bias towards data-driven decision making', '.\xa0PhD in Machine Learning or a related field', '· Ability to test ideas and adapt methods quickly end to end from data extraction to implementation and validation', '· Masters degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering or a related field', ' · Proven ability to understand complex business problems, identifying opportunities for ML / AI and launching models in production', '·\xa07+ years proven track record in the application of ML and NLP in an industrial setting', '· Ability to comfortably and confidently present to all levels and to work with both technical and non-technical stakeholders across multiple business units including at the executive level', 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS', ' · Ability to understand and discuss architectural concepts, tradeoffs and new opportunities with technical team members', 'Search and Analytics is a central technology team at Clarivate that develops best in class algorithmic services and search platforms for our products to enable differentiated capabilities. We take pride in innovating on behalf of our customers and delivering value to the business. Our scientists and engineers use Machine Learning, NLP, and Information Retrieval to solve problems along the entire Lifecycle of Innovation.\xa0\xa0', '· Established history of building successful, large-scale products from scratch']

['', 'Experience orchestrating data infrastructure (Spark, S3, Kafka/Kinesis, Redshift).', 'Manage vendor interactions related to our data stack', 'Tool our data systems for observability, including logging, metrics monitoring, and dashboarding', 'Birchbox was founded in 2010 to redefine the way consumers discover and shop for beauty and grooming. ['', 'WORKING LOCATIONS & ADDITIONAL INFO:', ' Work with a multidisciplinary team of research scientists and technicians to determine what pathological characteristics are measurable in the acute, subacute, and chronic periods following Penetrating or Ballistic brain injury. The results of these studies should refine our animal models of military relevant brain injury by better understanding the comorbidities during the sub-acute and chronic timeframe after injury. In addition, these studies will determine if it is possible to modulate outcomes based on affecting metabolic regulation and neuroplasticity in the injured brain. Areas of study by the multidisciplinary team include: Determine what pathological characteristics are measurable in the acute, subacute, and chronic periods following Projectile Concussive Impact (PCI) TBII. The expected result of this research effort is to deliver a fully characterized, validated animal model of close head concussive mild TBI. The model is expected to provide a research tool to study treatment strategies ranging from simple rest (i.e. sleep enhancement), rehab (physical and social enrichment), and therapeutics. Determine what pathological characteristics are measurable in the acute, subacute, and chronic periods following polytrauma to refine our animal models of TBI. In addition, these studies will determine if it is possible to modulate outcomes based on affecting metabolic regulation and neuroplasticity in the injured brain. Develop novel treatment strategies aimed at examining the technical feasibility of modulating neuroplasticity through the understanding of cerebral metabolic regulation and the use of environmental enrichment to modulate the effects of brain injury to better understand neurorehabilitation strategies of clinical recovery. Evaluate resuscitation strategies in polytrauma associated with TBI. Patients are faced with worse outcomes and increased morbidity when TBI occurs in conjunction with hemorrhage. Local tissue damage and systemic inflammatory responses induced by hemorrhagic shock resulting in hypoperfusion, decreased oxygen delivery, excitotoxicity, and perturbed autoregulation of cerebral blood flow, all of which account for the vulnerability of the injured brain to hypotensive insults. The results of these studies should refine our animal models of military relevant brain injury by better understanding the co-morbidities during the sub-acute and chronic timeframe after injury. In addition, these studies will determine if it is possible to modulate outcomes based on affecting metabolic regulation and neuroplasticity in the injured brain. Determine whether individual therapy or a combination of therapies, such as, but not limited to, pharmacologic (novel drugs and drug combinations) and cellular (stem and stromal cells) therapies, as well as the manipulation of physical conditions (brain cooling and intracranial pressure), have measurable efficacy on established injury deficits in the acute, subacute, and chronic periods following TBI (PBBI, PCI, or polytrauma). It is expected that these studies will identify novel drugs or treatment strategies that can be used alone or in combination to prevent or attenuate the incidence of acute and delayed clinical sequel associated with experimental TBI thereby enhancing neuroprotection and improving patient morbidity after a TBI.   ', ' WRAIR facility, Bldg 503, Silver Spring MD. Occasional travel for conference and symposia attendance and/or presentations ', ' Requires a graduate Ph.D. degree in Neuroscience, Neurobiology, Molecular Biology, Psychology, or another related scientific field. At least 3 years of post Doctorate preclinical (animal) research experience in Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI). Demonstrated ability to author research summaries and present research findings. Ability to operate research equipment requiring manual dexterity. Ability to handle research animals, wear appropriate personal protective equipment, and work in a Biosafety Level (BSL) 2 laboratory. Hands-on experience with rodent surgery and physiological monitoring techniques, as well as experience conducting experiments with laboratory rats that are designed to gain insights into injury mitigation and the medical care of combat casualties with TBI. Ability to utilize office automation equipment, including computers, photocopiers, telephones, and telefax machines. Local tissue damage and systemic inflammatory responses induced by hemorrhagic shock resulting in hypoperfusion, decreased oxygen delivery, excitotoxicity, and perturbed autoregulation of cerebral blood flow, all of which account for the vulnerability of the injured brain to hypotensive insults. The results of these studies should refine our animal models of military relevant brain injury by better understanding the co-morbidities during the sub-acute and chronic timeframe after injury. In addition, these studies will determine if it is possible to modulate outcomes based on affecting metabolic regulation and neuroplasticity in the injured brain.', 'Work with a multidisciplinary team of research scientists and technicians to determine what pathological characteristics are measurable in the acute, subacute, and chronic periods following Penetrating or Ballistic brain injury. The results of these studies should refine our animal models of military relevant brain injury by better understanding the comorbidities during the sub-acute and chronic timeframe after injury. In addition, these studies will determine if it is possible to modulate outcomes based on affecting metabolic regulation and neuroplasticity in the injured brain.', 'WRAIR Brain Trauma Neuroprotection', 'Odyssey Systems', 'Requires a graduate Ph.D. degree in Neuroscience, Neurobiology, Molecular Biology, Psychology, or another related scientific field.', 'At least 3 years of post Doctorate preclinical (animal) research experience in Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI).', 'WRAIR facility, Bldg 503, Silver Spring MD.', 'Preferred Qualifications']

['', '- Not interested in: Poor communication skills. Poor knowledge of basic statistics. Programmers and DB admins misrepresenting themselves as data scientists.', 'Not interested in:', '- Plan on interviewing candidates immediately.', '- Will sit on Main Campus', '- Nice to haves: R and Python are nice but other tools like SAS are ok. However willingness and ability to learn must substitute.', ' MUST HAVES:', '- Open to seeing someone right out of school if they have a PhD. PhD will have experience at university so no work experience required. Flexible about this.', '- Nice to haves:', '- Not open to 100% remote workers. However, there is the potential for some flexibility to work from home on occasion, if approved.', '- Team Dynamic/Culture: Eight person team, growing, highly skilled, open to new ideas.', '- Some maintenance work but mostly new development work.', '- Not a client facing role.', '- Open to candidates who are willing to relocate.', 'Additional Info:', '- MUST HAVES: Knowledge of statistical techniques, ability to communicate effectively, either R or Python. Creativity and initiative, critical thinking skills.', '- Bachelors in a STEM field with 5 years’ experience is REQUIRED.', '- Alternative Skills they would consider: Related fields where data science techniques are used, including biology, agriculture, economics, physics.', '- Potential for conversion based on performance and business needs.', '- Alternative Skills they would consider:', '- Will work with two or three others within a larger team of 20.', 'Request for Data Scientist for Capital Project NOVA', '- No Certifications are required.', 'Description:', '- Project Details: Design and build new analytics models, analyze novel business problems, incorporate the latest techniques using the best tools available. Customer segmentation, pricing and risk models. Results will drive business decisions and significant revenue.', 'Design, implement and optimize algorithms for unsupervised and supervised learning based on structured and unstructured data. Develop powerful business insights from social, marketing, industrial data and public policy using advanced machine learning techniques. Work closely with the software engineering team to productize analytic software. Collaborate with system integration and data warehouse engineers on data extraction and data cleaning. Work in a highly interactive, team-oriented environment. Requires a bachelor’s degree in a STEM or related field and 5 years of experience, or a Master’s degree in same with 3 years, or a PhD.']

['', 'We believe machine learning is software', 'We work on medium-term machine learning projects (4-8 months) with a high degree of autonomy. We are not external facing. We harness the subject matter expertise of other Crowe teams to build machine learning products. We architect and build complex distributed computing systems utilizing High Performance Computing (HPC) computing resources on-premise and in the cloud. We design and implement efficient and scalable machine learning systems from data collection and training to deployment and real-time serving using Python We write and review code for productionizing machine learning models from the RESTful API specification to deployment automation. ', 'We believe machine learning is software. While our Data Scientists experiment in Jupyter notebooks, they are not the end of our machine learning pipelines. job_title: Principal Data Scientist | NY - New York City
job_text: ['', 'Provides strategic leadership for the development, validation and delivery of algorithms, statistical models and reporting tools. Acts as the analytic team lead for highly complex projects involving multiple resources and tasks, providing individual mentoring in support of company objectives.Leads development and execution of new and/or highly complex algorithms and statistical predictive models and determines analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes.Establishes analytical rigor and statistical methods to analyze large amounts of data, using advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses.Manages highly complex analytical projects from data exploration, model building, performance evaluation and testing.Applies in-depth knowledge of systems and products to consult and advise on additional efforts across organization/enterprise. Motivates team members and probes into technical details, and mentors others to do the same.Provides thought leadership and direction for analytic solutions, tools and studies. Anticipates and solves strategic and high risk business problems with broad impact on the business area by applying leading-edge theories and techniques to investigate problems, detect patterns and recommend solutions.Provides guidance to develop enterprise-wide analytics strategy and roadmap. Interacts with internal and external peers and management to share highly complex information/solutions related to areas of expertise and/or to gain acceptance of new or enhanced technology/business solutions.', 'Excellent analytical and problem solving skills.', 'Expertise in advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.', 'Excellent analytical and problem solving skills.Strong organizational, management and leadership skills.Superior skills to effectively communicate and negotiate across the business and in the external health care environment', 'Position Summary ', 'Establishes analytical rigor and statistical methods to analyze large amounts of data, using advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses.', 'Provides strategic leadership for the development, validation and delivery of algorithms, statistical models and reporting tools. ', 'Leads development and execution of new and/or highly complex algorithms and statistical predictive models and determines analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes.', 'Interacts with internal and external peers and management to share highly complex information/solutions related to areas of expertise and/or to gain acceptance of new or enhanced technology/business solutions.', 'Demonstrates advanced in-depth specialization in mathematical analysis methods, machine learning, statistical analyses, and predictive modeling', ' Fundamental Components ', 'Expertise in advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.Expertise in innovating and implementing novel machine learning techniques.Comprehensive knowledge on health care industry, products, systems, business strategies and productsDemonstrates advanced in-depth specialization in mathematical analysis methods, machine learning, statistical analyses, and predictive modelingSuperior ability to communicate technical ideas and results to non-technical clients in written and verbal form.10 or more years of progressively complex related experience.', 'Provides guidance to develop enterprise-wide analytics strategy and roadmap. ', 'Applies in-depth knowledge of systems and products to consult and advise on additional efforts across organization/enterprise. Motivates team members and probes into technical details, and mentors others to do the same.', 'Expertise in innovating and implementing novel machine learning techniques.', 'Comprehensive knowledge on health care industry, products, systems, business strategies and products', 'Superior ability to communicate technical ideas and results to non-technical clients in written and verbal form.', 'Acts as the analytic team lead for highly complex projects involving multiple resources and tasks, providing individual mentoring in support of company objectives.', 'Manages highly complex analytical projects from data exploration, model building, performance evaluation and testing.', 'Superior skills to effectively communicate and negotiate across the business and in the external health care environment', ' Background Experience ', 'Strong organizational, management and leadership skills.', 'Provides thought leadership and direction for analytic solutions, tools and studies. ', '10 or more years of progressively complex related experience.', 'Anticipates and solves strategic and high risk business problems with broad impact on the business area by applying leading-edge theories and techniques to investigate problems, detect patterns and recommend solutions.']

['', 'Responsibilities:', '3+ years of professional experience in the areas of developing and deploying machine learning and NLP-based solutions.', 'Build ways to analyze and understand customer engagement and product performance through modeling and data visualization.', 'Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', 'Your goal – to build the machines that can tell stories to anyone in the world.', 'Support the ideation and implementation of solutions and feature sets for the customers, partner with Primer’s product and engineering organizations to create and deliver.Act as a full-stack everything: data scientist, engineer, and customer liaison for Primer.Partner with product and engineers at Primer to identify and prioritize new features and algorithms based on customer engagement and feedback.Build ways to analyze and understand customer engagement and product performance through modeling and data visualization.', "Primer is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. Please see the United States Department of Labor's EEO poster and EEO poster supplement for additional information.", 'Academic background in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, Economics, or quantitative discipline3+ years of professional experience in the areas of developing and deploying machine learning and NLP-based solutions.Hands-on experience with machine learning and NLP tools and libraries including Numpy, Scipy, Scikit-learn, SpaCy, NLTK, Torch, Tensorflow, KerasProven experience working with a variety of data sets, framing customer problems and use cases, and building data science models.Understanding of NLP topics: event and topic detection, relation, and extraction; pattern detection; entity recognition; and clustering and classification models.Ability to think about solutions from a customer perspective, establish conceptual connections between requirements and solutions.Experience working with AWS, Docker, and APIs.Excellent communication skills – you will be the face of Primer to customers’ organizations.', 'Requirements:', 'Primer is an artificial intelligence company that organizes and analyzes text-based data sources, and generates analyst-grade natural language summaries for a variety of industries. Our objective is to help our customers understand the world around them ‐‐ whether it is emerging geopolitical events, development of a product line or area of research, or monitoring a portfolio of companies’ financial performances.', 'Academic background in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, Economics, or quantitative discipline', 'At Primer, we put our customers first. The Senior Data Scientist role on the Services team will work with executives and leadership at customer organizations to understand their challenges and identify opportunities for Primer’s suite of technologies to support their needs. You will utilize your machine learning expertise to define, prototype, deploy, and maintain NLP/NLG solutions at Primer.', 'If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at info@primer.com.', 'The Services team is a jack-of-all-trades organization that serves as a key interface between individual clients and the broader Primer organization. Our charter is: (1) work closely with clients to discover the best use of Primer’s NLP/NLG algorithms for their needs; (2) prototype new algorithms, data pipelines, and visualizations; and (3) channel client feedback and algorithmic learnings back to Primer to drive future product development.', 'Experience working with AWS, Docker, and APIs.', '\xa0', 'Act as a full-stack everything: data scientist, engineer, and customer liaison for Primer.', 'Hands-on experience with machine learning and NLP tools and libraries including Numpy, Scipy, Scikit-learn, SpaCy, NLTK, Torch, Tensorflow, Keras', 'Excellent communication skills – you will be the face of Primer to customers’ organizations.', 'Ability to think about solutions from a customer perspective, establish conceptual connections between requirements and solutions.', 'Proven experience working with a variety of data sets, framing customer problems and use cases, and building data science models.', 'Understanding of NLP topics: event and topic detection, relation, and extraction; pattern detection; entity recognition; and clustering and classification models.', 'About Us', 'Partner with product and engineers at Primer to identify and prioritize new features and algorithms based on customer engagement and feedback.', 'Support the ideation and implementation of solutions and feature sets for the customers, partner with Primer’s product and engineering organizations to create and deliver.']

['', 'To qualify you must have a PhD in the biological sciences plus some post-doctoral experiencePrevious lab experience in immuno-oncology, immunology or oncology-based assays requiredExperience in pharma, drug screening or testing of biologics (antibody, ADCs, bispecifics) or small molecules preferredA minimum commitment of two years is required', 'Prepares figures and diagrams for presentations and publications.', 'Executes multiple experiments simultaneously over time independently.', 'Previous lab experience in immuno-oncology, immunology or oncology-based assays required', 'Generates hypotheses and designs and performs experiments to test them.', 'Manage day to day lab operations', 'A minimum commitment of two years is required', 'https://www.synthistx.com/job-opportunities', 'Experience in pharma, drug screening or testing of biologics (antibody, ADCs, bispecifics) or small molecules preferred', 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/synthis/', 'We are looking for creative and experienced people, who think outside of the proverbial box, to join our growing team of scientists. Immuno-oncology or oncology experience is required. Prior experience in drug discovery or the pharmaceutical industry is an added bonus, particularly with biologics such as antibodies or ADCs. ', 'Presents findings at lab meeting, responds to challenges, and participates in exchanges of ideas to advance the science.', 'Please send your resume and a brief introduction to doritkaryat@synthis-io.com', 'The successful candidate is responsible for conducting independent drug discovery experiments with Synthis’ novel drugs and driving research programs forward to IND enabling studies. Experience with primary human immune cell culture (T cell subsets, PBMCs, T-dendritic cell assays, MLRs, etc) and cell based assays (ELISA, cytotoxicity, proliferation, effector functions) are required. Prior experience in flow cytometry is essential. In addition, familiarity with molecular biology (cloning, QPCR, subcloning, mini/maxi preps, lenti-viral construction and infection, RNA prep/RT-PCR etc) and some protein handling (Western blots, IP) is an added bonus.\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communication', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Senior Research Scientist Position Available at Synthis Therapeutics, Inc (New York, NY)', 'Records all experimental findings in a laboratory notebook, analyze and interpret experimental findings.', 'Job Responsibilities:', 'Synthis is a pre-clinical stage, startup biotech company based in New York City that is developing first in class, immuno-oncology therapeutics to treat cancer patients. Synthis is a fast paced and dynamic company, whose mission is to bring differentiated cancer therapies to patients who need it the most. By joining our team, you are guaranteed to have an impact.', 'To qualify you must have a PhD in the biological sciences plus some post-doctoral experience', 'Communicates results and collaborates with other professionals in the lab.', 'Based on results, independently suggests and tests modifications to protocols.', 'Generates hypotheses and designs and performs experiments to test them.Executes multiple experiments simultaneously over time independently.Records all experimental findings in a laboratory notebook, analyze and interpret experimental findings.Based on results, independently suggests and tests modifications to protocols.Prepares figures and diagrams for presentations and publications.Communicates results and collaborates with other professionals in the lab.Demonstrates intellectual input into the design of the project.Presents findings at lab meeting, responds to challenges, and participates in exchanges of ideas to advance the science.Reads and understands relevant scientific literature.Excellent written and verbal communicationManage day to day lab operations', 'Reads and understands relevant scientific literature.', 'Demonstrates intellectual input into the design of the project.']

job_title: Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up
job_text: ['', '.', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniquesProfessional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and mungingProfessional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQueryExperience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modelingA self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value CreationExperience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQuery', 'In order to apply for this role you will have the following experience:', 'A self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value Creation', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.", "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.", "Orama are proud to announce their exclusive partnership with an AI Marketing Software Start-up who are tipped to be one of the biggest success stories of 2021. Their unique value proposition allows enterprise companies to understand and predict their customers' buying habits/patterns combining data gained from omnichannel marketing tech with the latest machine learning advances. Following their recent addtion of $40m+ round of funding, they are looking to hire a Data Science specialist who can help create value within their largest customers by deriving insights from data. This is a unique opportunity to play a pivotal role in their growth - GET IN TOUCH NOW!", 'Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up', 'Professional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)', 'Basic $100K-150K + bonus + Stock + Benefits', 'Desired Skills and Experience', 'Experience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.', 'Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniques', 'You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.', 'Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.', 'Experience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)', 'Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0', 'Professional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and munging']

job_text: ['', 'Experience with AutoML type frameworks ', 'A year or more of experience (academic research and/or industry) in Object Oriented Programming/Functional Programming for architecting scalable research oriented development frameworks and workflows ', 'What you will receive in return', "Passionate about staying abreast of challenges and exciting changes in ML and DL and their real time realizations for quickly establishing applicability to Ford engineering problems in order to build/contribute to the Ford's strategic and leadership vision ", 'Publish internally and engage in internal knowledge dissemination ', 'Background implementing AI-ML algorithms on resource constrained edge devices such as on inferencing systems NVDIA(TX-), NXP (Tree-Runner) etc. ', 'What you will be able to do', 'Present at respected conferences and publish in high-impact peer reviewed journals ', 'The minimum requirements we seek', 'Collaborate with application engineers to validate solutions against real-world application benchmarks for quality, robustness and continuous improvement ', 'Our preferred requirements', 'PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics or Robotics ', "Develop through, self-learning and deep research, new mathematical formulations and learning architectures as may become necessary when dealing with atypical/new problem statements. This will often require the synthesis of ML/DL research problem statements in conjunction with SME's and academia to seek out novel applications through re-purposing and/or discovery ", 'One or more years (academic research and/or industry) in developing with Python and a common DL framework (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe etc.) ', "PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical engineering problems in order to build/contribute to the Ford's strategic and leadership vision  ", 'Develop a research portfolio and lead research, development and progression of state-of-the-art concepts in ML-DL related to multimodal perception and the generation of contextual information for forward use in customer facing applications ', 'Exceptional communication, teamwork and and/or industry) in DL for one or more application areas including Vision, NLP, Human-Machine Interactions and/or Digital Assistants  One or more years (academic research and/or industry) in development frameworks and workflows  ", 'Experience with one or more cloud computing tools (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, etc.) ', 'At least one year of experience (academic research and/or industry) in DL for one or more application areas including Vision, NLP, Human-Machine Interactions and/or Digital Assistants ', 'One plus year of experience (academic research and/or industry) ['', 'Experience building robust and scalable data integration (ETL) pipelines using Airflow, SQL, Python and Spark.', 'You will Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using best Standard Practices in data modeling, ETL/ELT processes, and SQL, Python and Snowflake.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Duration:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Business Administration, Mathematics or a related field5+ years of industry experience as a Data Engineer or related specialty (e.g., Business Intelligence Engineer, Data Scientist)3+ years Programming experience manipulating and analyzing data (Python or Scala)Experience building robust and scalable data integration (ETL) pipelines using Airflow, SQL, Python and Spark.Experience in data modeling, ETL development, and Data warehousingData Warehousing Experience with Oracle, Redshift, Teradata, Snowflake etcExperience building data products incrementally and integrating and managing data-sets from multiple sourcesExperience with Big Data Technologies (Hadoop, Hive, Hbase, Pig, Spark, etc.) such as S3, EC2, and EMR (Spark) etc", 'Responsibilities:', 'Positions Details:', 'Experience working in AWS environment - preferably AWS Certification completed', 'Location: Seattle, WA', 'Location:', '3+ years Programming experience manipulating and analyzing data (Python or Scala)', 'Experience building data products incrementally and integrating and managing data-sets from multiple sources', 'Job Title: Data Engineer', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Business Administration, Mathematics or a related field", 'Experience in data modeling, ETL development, and Data warehousing', 'You will interact with team members and internal customers to gather requirements and build robust and secure data flows. ['', 'Lead machine learning model deployment and production execution.', 'Collaborate with Engineering and business stakeholders to design, develop, and implement end-to-end scalable machine learning systems for customer targeting, messaging, acquisition, and retention.', 'Job Duties', 'Investor’s Business Daily (IBD) ', '\ufeffThe work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential duties of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.\xa0The information in this position description indicates the general nature and level of work to be performed. It is not designed to be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities, and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job.\xa0Management reserves the right to revise the job description or require that other tasks be performed when the circumstances of the job change (for example, emergencies, change in personnel, workload, or technical development).\xa0This does not alter the nature of the at-will employment between the employer and employee where either party can end the relationship at any time, for any reason or no reason, with or without notice.', 'Ph.D. in a related quantitative field', 'Ph.D. in a related quantitative field2+ years of experience with\xa0digital\xa0subscription\xa0business', 'Design and analyze metrics to evaluate and monitor the effectiveness of deployed machine learning models.', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit and use hands to type. The noise level in the work environment is usually moderate. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.', 'Job Qualifications', 'Office / Sedentary Requirements', 'Partner with data engineering team to integrate new data sources,\xa0uncover opportunities for machine learning automation and predictive modeling across IBD products.', 'Collaborate with Engineering and business stakeholders to design, develop, and implement end-to-end scalable machine learning systems for customer targeting, messaging, acquisition, and retention.Develop\xa0prediction algorithms, sorting algorithms, large-scale machine learning for recommendations and personalization with high quality, maintainable and scalable code.Support marketing, product, content teams at IBD in optimizing all customer touch points by detecting usage patterns with data-driven methods and translating them into better customer experience and higher customer LTV.Lead machine learning model deployment and production execution.Design and analyze metrics to evaluate and monitor the effectiveness of deployed machine learning models.Partner with data engineering team to integrate new data sources,\xa0uncover opportunities for machine learning automation and predictive modeling across IBD products.Research and implement best practices to help develop and enhance machine learning infrastructure.', 'Investor’s Business Daily (IBD) is a financial website and national weekly newspaper known for innovative coverage and fact-based analysis of the stock market, economy, business and public policy. We offer an environment that encourages and rewards learning and professional growth and the opportunity to gain first-hand knowledge of how to invest successfully.', '2+ years of work experience in a machine learning, data science, and data engineering', 'Research and implement best practices to help develop and enhance machine learning infrastructure.', 'Support marketing, product, content teams at IBD in optimizing all customer touch points by detecting usage patterns with data-driven methods and translating them into better customer experience and higher customer LTV.', 'Preferred Education, Experience, Certification/Licensure', 'Job Summary', '2+ years of experience with\xa0digital\xa0subscription\xa0business', 'Develop\xa0prediction algorithms, sorting algorithms, large-scale machine learning for recommendations and personalization with high quality, maintainable and scalable code.', 'Develop advanced data science solutions and end-to-end machine learning systems to drive customer base growth, new product development, and personalized customer experience for Investor’s Business Daily (IBD).', 'Graduate degree in a quantitative field (Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Statistics, Operations Research, etc.)', 'Graduate degree in a quantitative field (Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Statistics, Operations Research, etc.)2+ years of work experience in a machine learning, data science, and data engineering']

['', '2+ years of industry experience.', 'Work with system engineering and metrics teams to develop data-driven metrics to score the AV behavior at a system level.\xa0', "What you'll be doing:", "What we're looking for:", 'Conduct bottom-up analysis to derive metrics targeted at key aspects of safety.', 'The machine learning team behind nuScenes (https://www.nuscenes.org), PointPillars (https://arxiv.org/abs/1812.05784), and PointPainting (http://arxiv.org/abs/1911.10150) is building out a metrics team.\xa0', 'The ML metrics team will focus on data-driven metrics development for systems and subsystems to guide training and evaluation of our neural networks. The team charter is centered around two core concepts. First: how should we score the AV system as a whole in a way that is compliant with legal, ethical and ride comfort related constraints? Second: given such system level score, how do we score subsystems in a way that informs progress towards the system level goals.', 'Conduct variational analysts on the system architecture graph to understand what aspects of the subsystem performance matter at the system level.', 'Deploy code and systems to put metrics into production.', 'Track record of driving research projects from start to completion, including conception, problem definition, experimentation, iteration, and finally publication or productization.', 'Data science and system evaluation experience.', 'Fluent in python or C++.', 'Work with system engineering and metrics teams to develop data-driven metrics to score the AV behavior at a system level.\xa0Conduct variational analysts on the system architecture graph to understand what aspects of the subsystem performance matter at the system level.Conduct bottom-up analysis to derive metrics targeted at key aspects of safety.Deploy code and systems to put metrics into production.', 'Strong communication and presentation skills - can explain complicated topics and ideas in a clear and concise manner.', 'Masters or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or a related field.', '2+ years of industry experience.Masters or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or a related field.Solid understanding of fundamental statistics and machine learning concepts.Track record of driving research projects from start to completion, including conception, problem definition, experimentation, iteration, and finally publication or productization.Data science and system evaluation experience.Strong communication and presentation skills - can explain complicated topics and ideas in a clear and concise manner.Fluent in python or C++.', 'Solid understanding of fundamental statistics and machine learning concepts.']

['', 'Experience implementing UX health metrics via benchmarking, survey design, and longitudinal tracking', '4-6 years of experience with Product organizations conducting UX research using both qualitative and quantitative methods', 'Experience applying a diverse toolkit of research methodologies', 'Work with other research-related functions such as marketing, data science, and analytics to triangulate and contextualize user research findings', 'Email is the universal communication tool for work. It’s where you discuss work, answer questions, and talk to all of your customers, vendors, and partners. But email wasn’t designed for business and hasn’t evolved with the way you work with a team. So you’re dropping the ball, missing important context, and relying on dozens of siloed apps just to get the job done.\xa0', 'Deeply understand our audiences to effectively communicate how Front can address their needs', 'Partner closely with designers and product managers to help them successfully execute their own researchIdentify research needs in partnership with the Product teamDesign and facilitate multi-method studies across important product areas, using methods such as ethnographic/field research, diary studies, surveys, user/usability testing, ideation workshops, and any other methods you find impactfulAnalyze research insights and present findings and recommendations to key stakeholdersDeeply understand our audiences to effectively communicate how Front can address their needsEffectively present and articulate your rationale to stakeholders and executivesWork with other research-related functions such as marketing, data science, and analytics to triangulate and contextualize user research findings', 'With more than 6,000 customers Front is reinventing the inbox so teams can accomplish more together. We’ve created a single place where you communicate internally and externally, gain context about customers and projects, and access all your other tools so you can be more efficient, more fulfilled, and ultimately happier at work.', 'What you’ll do:', '4-6 years of experience with Product organizations conducting UX research using both qualitative and quantitative methodsExperience applying a diverse toolkit of research methodologiesExperience with SaaS, B2B or other complex technical systems a plusExperience implementing UX health metrics via benchmarking, survey design, and longitudinal trackingProven track record of teaching other disciplines about the process and value of researchExperience taking the lead and defining research needs for broad or ambiguous product areasAdvocacy for research insights and examples of insights that led to shipped product experiences', 'Experience with SaaS, B2B or other complex technical systems a plus', 'As a Design Researcher at Front you’ll help to guide us in bringing our users’ needs to the forefront of how we design Front. You will play a key role in shaping every aspect of how we better connect with our users from surveys, to formative research studies, to tactical usability research. You’ll help us better our current product experience while guiding us into the future.', 'Design and facilitate multi-method studies across important product areas, using methods such as ethnographic/field research, diary studies, surveys, user/usability testing, ideation workshops, and any other methods you find impactful', 'Advocacy for research insights and examples of insights that led to shipped product experiences', 'What we’re looking for:', 'Identify research needs in partnership with the Product team', 'Analyze research insights and present findings and recommendations to key stakeholders', 'Experience taking the lead and defining research needs for broad or ambiguous product areas', 'Proven track record of teaching other disciplines about the process and value of research', 'Partner closely with designers and product managers to help them successfully execute their own research', 'Effectively present and articulate your rationale to stakeholders and executives']

['', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to compile, review, filter, synthesize, and interpret information which is varied in content and format.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong organizational skills, including the ability to produce a high quality and accurate work product with minimal supervision in an atmosphere of multiple projects, shifting priorities, and extremely tight deadline pressure.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong research skills using internal and external resources.\xa0Proven aptitude to quickly learn new applications.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborates with the ICS team and the Office of General Counsel to research, analyze, and resolve conflicts of interest.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree and two years of experience in a legal environment preferred; or any equivalent combination of training, education, and experience that demonstrates the ability to perform the duties of the position.', 'The Conflicts Researcher is a member of Troutman Pepper’s Intake & Conflicts Services (ICS) department.\xa0\xa0Working under the direction of the Intake Manager, a Conflicts Researcher is responsible for researching potential conflicts of interest as a key component of the law firm’s new business intake and lateral hiring processes.\xa0This position can be based in Atlanta, GA, Philadelphia, PA, Virginia (Richmond or Virginia Beach), or Portland, Oregon.', 'EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE', 'QUALIFICATIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Conducts factual research using internal and external resources, which may include researching corporate relationships and discussions with attorneys and/or staff to gather information and/or clarification regarding a party or matter.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Performs conflicts of interest searches for lateral attorney candidates and incoming Staff, Project Attorneys, and Summer/Fall Associates, using Intapp, the Firm’s conflicts and intake database.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to write effective business correspondence that presents information and/or responds to questions from attorneys or staff in a professional and courteous manner.\xa0This includes reasonable ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Performs conflict of interest searches for clients, matters, and/or other new business, using Intapp, the Firm’s conflicts and intake database.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work effectively with the Firm’s attorneys and staff at all levels.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Performs quality control reviews of client/matter intake, including reviewing and analyzing client/matter intake submissions to ensure that data is accurate, complete, and adheres to established policies and procedures.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Performs database maintenance, data entry, and special projects, as requested by the Intake Manager.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Reviews and analyzes conflict of interest reports to identify false positive hits; adjusts search terms and search strategies, if necessary.', 'Continues development of skills, process improvements, and knowledge of the applicable rules regarding conflicts of interest and trends/changes in the legal industry.']

job_title: UX Researcher (qual / quant mix) for fintech
job_text: ['mix of experience using qualitative and quantitative methodologies', 'SQL, HQL, Pivot Tables, RStudio, Photoshop, SharePoint, Sketch, InVision, ', 'Qualifications:', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong project management and negotiating skills are central to the position. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong communication, critical thinking, and creative problem-solving skills required. ', 'The strong candidate will: ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to communicate research results, graphically depict data, and justify methods and approaches—orally and in writing—considered a good thing (wild gesturing optional). ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong moderation skills and methods for group facilitation and consensus building. ', '\xa0 ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa03-5+ years of user experience research for digital. We prefer a mix of experience using qualitative and quantitative methodologies. ', 'Fintech / financial / and/or wealth management', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Fintech / financial / and/or wealth management\xa0experience is a strong plus. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience planning and facilitating workshops (hypothesis, concepting, design-thinking, insights) with stakeholders to facilitate the design process. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Be able to take sometimes ambiguous notions and craft those into solid, testable research hypotheses around which you will design and deliver the appropriate research. ', 'Key Skills:', 'The strong candidate will:', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Conduct competitive and comparative research and analysis to complement user research. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Independently scope and plan a research program (can include multiple projects with multiple related studies), consulting with relevant stakeholders and team members. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Confidently apply a range of frameworks to synthesize and solve research problems. ', 'In this role, you will be responsible for scoping and crafting research strategy, conducting research, and delivering actionable insights for a variety of digital projects. \xa0A qualified candidate will demonstrate experience and expertise planning, leading, and executing user research programs. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Knowledge of SQL, HQL, Pivot Tables, RStudio, Photoshop, SharePoint, Sketch, InVision, or other scripting or prototyping tools are additionally advantageous ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to work independently, in a team, and with or without direction is imperative. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong understanding of user interface design practices and principles a must. ', 'Key Skills: ', 'Simply put, we are looking for someone with extensive research experience, solid intellect, and organizational ability. And of course, you have to be fun to work with! ', 'Aquent’s global F100 banking/fintech client seeks a User Experience Researcher with strong mixed-methods and design research skills. Seeking a researcher individual who is sharp in both quant and qual, who will complement the team. If you can explain why you’re that person, we want you! ', 'Be able to roll-up your sleeves and learn / write SQL scripts to gather behavioral data for secondary or primary research needs. ', 'Qualifications: ', 'Location: ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Have excellent project management and organizational skills and be able to work collaboratively and productively with diverse teams and as well as independently. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Leverage heuristics, VoC, statistical analyses, and other insightful methods to triangulate user pain points. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Extensive knowledge of user experience research tools and techniques (e.g. field research, heuristic reviews, usability testing, benchmarking, card sorts, lo-fidelity prototyping methods, etc.) ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Related experience across devices or in another field such as interactive design, information architecture, and/or market research is a plus.', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Demonstrate a high degree of user empathy and will be able to tell a compelling story about the motivations and intentions of our users, inspiring all stakeholders towards “Aha!” moments. ', 'Location: Due to COVID restrictions, this role will start out working from home; however, seeking candidates who are commutable to Jersey City (a Jersey City / NYC split is als possible). ']

['', 'Experience with the use and analysis of public gene expression datasets such as: GEO, TCGA, cBioPortal, GTEx, CCLE, DepMap, and PCAWG', 'Experience in developing and running analyses in a Unix/Linux/cloud environment', 'Experience in identifying immune cell-type signatures via gene set expression and or deconvolution.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience working with high dimensional omics datasets as well as identifying SNPs somatic variants, alternative splicing, fusion genes, indels, structural variants, copy number to help drug discovery and in identifying unique patient cohorts', 'Communicate data and analyses to a broad scientific audience', 'Zentalis Pharmaceuticals is a San Diego based pharmaceutical company dedicated to the discovery and development of small molecule therapeutics targeting fundamental biological pathways of cancer. In the five years since our inception, we have successfully cleared three INDs with the FDA and expect to submit a fourth IND in the first half of 2020 and a fifth IND in 2021.\xa0We believe our deep pipeline of oncology therapeutics has the potential to significantly improve the lives of patients with various types of cancer. ', 'Experience in the analysis of gene networks and pathway analysis using approaches such as gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) or weighted gene correlation network analysis (WGCNA)', 'Keep abreast of emerging methods in computational biology/bioinformatics and leverage innovative opportunities', 'Process, analyze, and interpret a wide range of datasets for the development and validation of new technologies in the fields of small molecule oncology therapeutics', 'PhD in Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or similar field, with at least 2 years of post-doctoral experience with a strong publication recordExperience working with high dimensional omics datasets as well as identifying SNPs somatic variants, alternative splicing, fusion genes, indels, structural variants, copy number to help drug discovery and in identifying unique patient cohortsExperience in the development and application of statistical/machine learning methods to the analysis of diverse biological and clinical datasetsExperience with NGS (RNA-Seq, single-cell RNA-Seq, WGS) data pipelines and analyses as well as using tools such as STAR, Salmon, Bowtie, Tophat, Picard tools, and Samtools.Experience in the analysis of gene networks and pathway analysis using approaches such as gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) or weighted gene correlation network analysis (WGCNA)Experience with the use and analysis of public gene expression datasets such as: GEO, TCGA, cBioPortal, GTEx, CCLE, DepMap, and PCAWGExperience in identifying immune cell-type signatures via gene set expression and or deconvolution.Experience in utilizing Python and R programming languages for the analysis of diverse datasets as well as bioinformatics pipeline development. Experience in developing and running analyses in a Unix/Linux/cloud environment', 'Develop and apply bioinformatics tools to support our drug discovery process and biomarker strategies.', 'Integrate multi-platform datasets (public and proprietary) and apply advanced data-mining/machine learning methodologies to help inform and support drug and biomarker discovery. ', 'Develop and apply bioinformatics tools to support our drug discovery process and biomarker strategies.Process, analyze, and interpret a wide range of datasets for the development and validation of new technologies in the fields of small molecule oncology therapeuticsIntegrate multi-platform datasets (public and proprietary) and apply advanced data-mining/machine learning methodologies to help inform and support drug and biomarker discovery. Communicate data and analyses to a broad scientific audienceKeep abreast of emerging methods in computational biology/bioinformatics and leverage innovative opportunities', 'PhD in Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or similar field, with at least 2 years of post-doctoral experience with a strong publication record', 'Qualifications: ', 'Experience in utilizing Python and R programming languages for the analysis of diverse datasets as well as bioinformatics pipeline development. ', 'Experience with NGS (RNA-Seq, single-cell RNA-Seq, WGS) data pipelines and analyses as well as using tools such as STAR, Salmon, Bowtie, Tophat, Picard tools, and Samtools.', 'Experience in the development and application of statistical/machine learning methods to the analysis of diverse biological and clinical datasets', '\ufeff']

['', 'Skills and experience you will bring include:', 'For immediate consideration and more information on this exciting career opportunity please submit your resume via the Katalyst Group Careers page (https://www.katalyst-group.com/) or email your resume directly to us at\xa0hello@katalyst-group.com', 'Visualize and report data findings creatively in a variety of visual formats that appropriately provide insight to the stakeholders', 'Senior Financial Analyst', 'Katalyst was founded in 2019 to help finance executives rapidly assemble project resources to address special projects, and recruit individuals for key hires within their respective organizations. The Katalyst team are former accounting, finance, program and project management professionals that have made a career of curating networks and connecting the dots. Our values-based culture extends to those we engage; therefore, we are selective and discerning about the organizations we support to ensure they are a good fit for those we represent.', 'In this role you will:', 'Katalyst Group is a provider of executive search, project and interim placement solutions with expertise in supporting Accounting, Finance, and Business Transformation executives with special projects created by workforce gaps. As a human capital partner for our clients, we solve business problems across organizations in the areas of Risk and Compliance, Governance, and Technology.', 'This is an exciting opportunity for you to positively contribute broadly across a valuable health system that has been supporting members of the Chicagoland community for decades.\xa0The health system leadership team is excited to support your continued career development and expose you to all levels of financial and data analysis, project management, and implementation of new technologies to drive the organization’s ongoing expansion of services and impact on the community.\xa0', 'Possess end-to-end data expertise including data sourcing, consolidation, integration, manipulation, and visualization', 'About Katalyst Group',
