Work on environmental assessments/impact analysis and associated permitting and compliance monitoring for transportation, industrial, energy, and other infrastructure projects that require conformance with Federal/State/City Environmental Reviews. Work under the supervision of mid-level and senior environmental scientists and managers. Assist with environmental permits, biological assessments, and NEPA, and similar study documents. Assist senior and mid-level scientists with field work associated with the collection of natural resource data, such as wetland delineation, mussel surveys, vegetation and habitat surveys. Assist scientists, planners and engineers in production of deliverables, and performing quality reviews and documentation. Research and interpret scientific literature, regulatory programs, guidance and applications. Collect project-related data, which may include research, conducting surveys for listed species, interviews with government agencies and clients, map reviews, field investigations for wetlands, natural resources, land use, etc. Assimilate and manage data, provide creative graphical representations of complex information. Work with geographic positioning tools and information systems. Assist in preparation for and participation in public information meetings and hearings Perform other related duties as needed.', ' Some field work will be required, and candidate must have the ability to work in field conditions and carry necessary tools and equipment', ' Assist senior and mid-level scientists with field work associated with the collection of natural resource data, such as wetland delineation, mussel surveys, vegetation and habitat surveys.', " Bachelor's degree in Environmental Science or closely related field, advanced degree desirable.", ' Experience in the Ohio area preferred.', ' Excellent writing skills.', " Bachelor's degree in Environmental Science or closely related field, advanced degree desirable. 5+ years-experience related to responsibilities above. Excellent writing skills. MS Office suite experience. Strong conceptual, organizational, problem-solving and research abilities. An attitude and commitment to being an active participant of our employee-owned culture is a must. Experience in the Ohio area preferred. Professional certifications such as WPIT, PWS, CWB, AICP, etc are preferred. Some field work will be required, and candidate must have the ability to work in field conditions and carry necessary tools and equipment Travel may be required to project sites regionally and nationally.", 'About Us', 'Why HDR', 'Primary Location', ' Perform other related duties as needed.', ' Strong conceptual, organizational, problem-solving and research abilities.', ' An attitude and commitment to being an active participant of our employee-owned culture is a must.', ' MS Office suite experience.', ' Travel may be required to project sites regionally and nationally.', ' Research and interpret scientific literature, regulatory programs, guidance and applications.', 'Other Locations']

['Working with product, data science, and engineering teams to contribute to all phases of algorithm development including: ideation, prototyping, design, and production', 'Passion for building reliable machine learning products and infrastructure', " Working with product, data science, and engineering teams to contribute to all phases of algorithm development including: ideation, prototyping, design, and production Building, iterating, productinize and owning Alt's valuation models Help build and define the valuation team at Alt from the ground up ", "Building, iterating, productinize and owning Alt's valuation models", 'Requirements', 'Product-oriented mindset', " Working with product, data science, and engineering teams to contribute to all phases of algorithm development including: ideation, prototyping, design, and production Building, iterating, productinize and owning Alt's valuation models Help build and define the valuation team at Alt from the ground up", 'Responsibilities', '3+ years of relevant experience', 'Benefits', 'Experience developing and pushing production code as part of an engineering team', 'Help build and define the valuation team at Alt from the ground up', 'Excellent communication skills', "DescriptionAlt's mission is to increase the transparency and liquidity of alternative assets. For investors who are looking for a trusted system of record, Alt is a platform that allows you to research, manage, insure, and leverage your portfolio. Whether it's sports cards, shoes, watches, or art, Alt will automatically value your assets, secure your portfolio and help you invest intelligently.As a machine learning engineer at Alt, you will help productionize our valuation product that will allow our users to research, manage, insure, and leverage their alternative asset portfolio. We are very early in the building phase so you will be instrumental in laying the foundation at Alt and will have the opportunity to shape the product and culture from the beginning.Responsibilities Working with product, data science, and engineering teams to contribute to all phases of algorithm development including: ideation, prototyping, design, and production Building, iterating, productinize and owning Alt's valuation models Help build and define the valuation team at Alt from the ground up Requirements 3+ years of relevant experience Passion for building reliable machine learning products and infrastructure Experience developing and pushing production code as part of an engineering team Experience in technologies such as AWS, Python, Airflow, and SQL Product-oriented mindset Excellent communication skills Benefits Working with product, data science, and engineering teams to contribute to all phases of algorithm development including: ideation, prototyping, design, and production Building, iterating, productinize and owning Alt's valuation models Help build and define the valuation team at Alt from the ground up", 'Experience in technologies such as AWS, Python, Airflow, and SQL', ' 3+ years of relevant experience Passion for building reliable machine learning products and infrastructure Experience developing and pushing production code as part of an engineering team Experience in technologies such as AWS, Python, Airflow, and SQL Product-oriented mindset Excellent communication skills ']

['', '7. Works with the clinical validation team for regulated assay launch', '9. Lead or assist in troubleshooting of problems of the AGS laboratory, as needed', 'The AGS Sr. Scientist is responsible for the hands-on development and oversight of new assays, maintenance of existing tests, and project planning and budgeting for Pharmaceutical partners. In addition, the Senior Scientist is expected to assist in strategic decision making, stay informed with respect to advances in the fields of genomics, genetic testing, and promising new technologies/ approaches that support Ambry’s Pharma business objectives. The position requires frequent and close collaboration across AGS as well as external departments and is best suited for a candidate who can efficiently work in a goal-oriented research and development setting.', 'Ph.D degree in a life sciences field (Biology, Molecular Biology, Biochemistry or related field) with 4 yrs post-graduate experience', '5 -7 years research experience in an academic setting and 2 - 5 years industry experience.', 'Job Overview: ', 'Strong previous experience developing clinical or RUO assays for somatic variant detection in cancer using NGS platforms.', '4. Interfaces the AGS Director, Clinical Laboratory Directors, Compliance, Genetic Counselors, Information Technology, Project Managers, Bioinformatics and Marketing to assure efficient development and implementation of new technologies and workflows for each offering. ', 'Hands-on experience generating, troubleshooting, and analyzing large complex datasets, such as those obtained from high throughput functional genomics screens, microarray, NGS, and/or proteomics experiments.', 'Job Overview:', 'Proficient in NGS/microarray/qPCR', 'Job Requirements:', 'Ambry Genetics is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race (and traits historically associated with race, including, but not limited to hair texture and protective hairstyles such as braids, locks, and twists), color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression (including transgender status), national origin, ancestry, age, marital status or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability, protected medical condition as defined by applicable state or local law, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local laws and ordinances.', '6. Design research strategy, plan experiments and budget, estimate project timelines, identify risks and contingencies.', 'At Ambry, everyone is welcome. A career at Ambry Genetics is a chance to be part of a dynamic company that aims to improve health by understanding the relationships between genetics and human disease. We earned our reputation as industry leaders by responsibly introducing cutting-edge genetic testing solutions and continually sharing what we learn with the global scientific community.', '2. Develop new tests with existing or novel methods for Pharma partners, including targeted NGS, microarray, qPCR or ddPCR, etc. ', '8. Draft papers and lead or assist with data analysis and compilation for purposes of publications, patents, and marketing.', 'Ph.D degree in a life sciences field (Biology, Molecular Biology, Biochemistry or related field) with 4 yrs post-graduate experienceProficient in NGS/microarray/qPCRStrong previous experience developing clinical or RUO assays for somatic variant detection in cancer using NGS platforms.Strong background in and/or knowledge of cancer biology and the useful diagnostic markers, approaches to detection, and limitations of existing methods.Hands-on experience generating, troubleshooting, and analyzing large complex datasets, such as those obtained from high throughput functional genomics screens, microarray, NGS, and/or proteomics experiments.Proficient with a broad range of standard molecular biology techniques, such as PCR, qPCR, RT-PCR, nucleic acid isolation, molecular cloning, NGS library construction, etc., the output of those techniques, how the output is assayed, and the analysis and interpretation of those results.Ability to communicate complex information clearly, effectively, and accurately as evidenced by first author publication(s).Strong computer and bioinformatics skills. Programming experience and/or use of command line tools is a plus.5 -7 years research experience in an academic setting and 2 - 5 years industry experience.Excellent verbal and written communication skills and ability to communicate and work effectively and positively with all levels of the organization.', 'Strong computer and bioinformatics skills. Programming experience and/or use of command line tools is a plus.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills and ability to communicate and work effectively and positively with all levels of the organization.', 'About Us:\xa0', 'Ambry Genetics Corporation is a CAP-accredited and CLIA-licensed molecular genetics laboratory based in Aliso Viejo, California. We are a genetics-based healthcare company that is dedicated to open scientific exchange so we can work together to understand and treat all human disease faster.', 'Ability to communicate complex information clearly, effectively, and accurately as evidenced by first author publication(s).', 'Job Responsibilities:', '1. Provide technical support and interface with Pharmaceutical partners', '10. Supervise and manage Scientist and Research Associates, including training, mentoring, and review of employee progress. Communicate with Director effectively in regards to project performance and progress.', 'Ambry does not accept unsolicited resumes from individual recruiters, third party recruiting agencies, outside recruiters or firms without an executed contract in place. We are not responsible for any fees related to resumes that are unsolicited or are received by Ambry. Such resumes will be deemed the sole property of Ambry and will be processed accordingly.', 'At Ambry you will be learning, challenging yourself, and having fun while collaborating with teammates through the open exchange of ideas. We also offer access to gym memberships, onsite food trucks, “Lunch and Learns,” and more. Our outstanding benefits program includes medical, dental, vision, 401k, FSA, and generous paid time off (PTO) program. Ambry Genetics is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE) and we maintain a drug-free work environment.', '3. Aid in technology improvement of existing tests, e.g. evaluate new reagents, protocol modifications, methods, equipment that may improve the sample throughput and or quality of results, or may provide budgetary savings. ', 'Strong background in and/or knowledge of cancer biology and the useful diagnostic markers, approaches to detection, and limitations of existing methods.', 'Proficient with a broad range of standard molecular biology techniques, such as PCR, qPCR, RT-PCR, nucleic acid isolation, molecular cloning, NGS library construction, etc., the output of those techniques, how the output is assayed, and the analysis and interpretation of those results.', '5. Research new projects for potential development. May include literature research for project utility and scope.']

['', 'Ability to support and communicate effectively with research astronomers, both experts and novices in the field of FIR astronomyExcellent written and verbal communication in English is required, fluency in written and spoken German a plus.Ability to read and interpret documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals.Ability to write routine reports and correspondence, speak effectively before groups of customers or employees of organization.Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions.Ability to interpret an extensive variety of technical instructions in and deal with several abstract and concrete variables.Proficiency in Microsoft Office and its applications.Teamwork and the ability to work effectively with co-workers, customers, and supervisor in a professional and courteous manner.', 'The job requires the ability to work onboard the SOFIA observatory, both on the ground and in flight.\xa0Significant parts of the job requires night-time work, away from the home base.', 'PhD in Astronomy, Physics or related field', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Essential Duties/Responsibilities:', 'Perform general scientific observatory support functions (proposal technical reviews, support of colloquium series, generate and give SOFIA related presentations, etc.) as directed by SMO management.', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee may occasionally be exposed to fumes or airborne particles.\xa0The employee may be exposed to moving equipment, vehicles and mechanical parts.\xa0The noise level in the work office environment is typically mild.\xa0The environment on the aircraft during flight operations may become noisy and tiring. The employee must be capable of performing all duties in a technical / scientific setting including offices, laboratories, shops, and aircraft maintenance facilities as well as on the aircraft / observatory, both while on the ground and during flights.\xa0The employee may need to lift and / or move up to 50 pounds.', 'Complete required trainings as scheduled.', 'Other job related duties as assigned', 'USRA is an Equal Opportunity Employer: Minorities / Females / Protected Veterans / Disabled / Sexual Orientation / Gender Identity.', 'Experience with analyzing data from modern scientific facilities', 'Provide support to General Observers, including the preparation for, acquisition of, and reduction of observations taken with SOFIA science instruments, especially HAWC+.', 'Instrument scientists will have a fraction of their time available for their own scientific research. The research should preferably be aligned with SOFIA’s scientific themes, which include using infrared observations and to study the birth of stars and planets, origins of life, physics of the distance universe, and evolution of planetary systems. Funding is available for travel to conferences and observing runs, computer equipment, publications and visiting collaborators.', 'Minimum of 2 years of post-PhD degree experience in astronomical research and infrared observations', 'Characterize and conduct observations with SOFIA science instruments, especially HAWC+. Knowledge of astronomical data reduction id required, and additional knowledge of instrument hardware and data acquisition software is preferred.Provide support to General Observers, including the preparation for, acquisition of, and reduction of observations taken with SOFIA science instruments, especially HAWC+.Execute observations with SOFIA science instruments in queue observing mode (for the General Investigator community) as necessaryTrack and report on instrument capabilities and assist in repairs/adjustments as necessary.Represent SOFIA and engage the scientific community in research work through research collaborations, visits, invited guests, workshops, conferences, etc.Perform general scientific observatory support functions (proposal technical reviews, support of colloquium series, generate and give SOFIA related presentations, etc.) as directed by SMO management.Perform scientific research in astronomy, broadly relevant to SOFIA.Ensure the protection of NASA and USRA intellectual property with respect to commercial and International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) and the Export Administration Regulations (EAR) concerns through disclosures, patent applications, and adherence to NASA’s scientific and technical information dissemination guidelines.Support efforts by USRA Management to ensure that USRA conducts its business operations in an effective, cost-competitive, and professional mannerComplete required trainings as scheduled.Other job related duties as assigned', 'Working Conditions:', 'Travel:', 'Experience in ground-based or air-borne infrared observations is a particular advantage', 'Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions.', 'www.usra.edu', 'Experience with infrared observations and data reduction/analysis is preferred', 'Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:\xa0', 'Experience:\xa0', 'This job primarily operates in a professional office environment. This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, etc. Extensive online usage. While performing the duties of this job, the employee is frequently required to stand; walk; sit, use hands.\xa0Keyboarding for large time spans each day will be a significant part of this position.', 'Support efforts by USRA Management to ensure that USRA conducts its business operations in an effective, cost-competitive, and professional manner', 'Ensure the protection of NASA and USRA intellectual property with respect to commercial and International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) and the Export Administration Regulations (EAR) concerns through disclosures, patent applications, and adherence to NASA’s scientific and technical information dissemination guidelines.', 'Execute observations with SOFIA science instruments in queue observing mode (for the General Investigator community) as necessary', 'Track and report on instrument capabilities and assist in repairs/adjustments as necessary.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication in English is required, fluency in written and spoken German a plus.', 'Education:', 'Ability to support and communicate effectively with research astronomers, both experts and novices in the field of FIR astronomy', 'Good track record of publications in leading scientific journals', 'Characterize and conduct observations with SOFIA science instruments, especially HAWC+. Knowledge of astronomical data reduction id required, and additional knowledge of instrument hardware and data acquisition software is preferred.', 'Represent SOFIA and engage the scientific community in research work through research collaborations, visits, invited guests, workshops, conferences, etc.', 'Applicants should apply to the posting and include a letter of interest, resume, or curriculum vita. Additional information on USRA can be found at www.usra.edu.\xa0', 'Experience with astronomical instrumentation and/or observer support is preferred', 'Ability to read and interpret documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals.', 'Teamwork and the ability to work effectively with co-workers, customers, and supervisor in a professional and courteous manner.', 'Ability to write routine reports and correspondence, speak effectively before groups of customers or employees of organization.', 'These positions are based at NASA AMES Research Center Moffett Field, CA but significant travel is required to Armstrong Flight Research Center and international business travel for long lengths of time.', 'Applications are invited for an instrument scientist position at the Stratospheric Observatory for Infrared Astronomy (SOFIA). The instrument scientists are experts on the operation of, and data produced by, the SOFIA scientific instruments, generally with a primary focus on one instrument and a supporting role on another. Instrument scientist serve as the point of contact between the observatory and the guest observers, prepare, plan, and oversee the execution of observations during flight operations (as part of a team with the instrument operator, telescope operator, and mission director), and carry out the inspection, calibration analysis, and quality assurance assessment of data reduced by the automatic pipelines to ensure that high quality calibrated products are generated, ingested into the archive, and distributed to the community.\xa0SOFIA science flights are at night and last 8-10 hr; an instrument scientist flies approximately a dozen flights per year.\xa0We are currently seeking a scientist to support the HAWC+, GREAT, and FIFI-LS facility instruments.', 'Perform scientific research in astronomy, broadly relevant to SOFIA.', 'Minimum of 2 years of post-PhD degree experience in astronomical research and infrared observationsExperience in ground-based or air-borne infrared observations is a particular advantageExperience with astronomical observing on modern facilitiesExperience with astronomical instrumentation and/or observer support is preferredExperience with analyzing data from modern scientific facilitiesExperience with infrared observations and data reduction/analysis is preferredGood track record of publications in leading scientific journals', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office and its applications.', 'Ability to interpret an extensive variety of technical instructions in and deal with several abstract and concrete variables.', 'Experience with astronomical observing on modern facilities']

and expected outcomes\xa0', 'Job Description:', 'Effective oral and written communication to peers, leadership, and both technical and non-technical audiences\xa0', 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'We are a fast-growing startup that is disrupting the fraud industry by putting the control back into the hands of digital businesses with an innovative approach that bankrupts the underlying business model of fraudsters. Our fraud and abuse prevention platform combines real-time intelligence, rich analytics and adaptive step-up challenges to progressively diminish the profitability of attacks while adapting to evolving attack patterns. We offer the only fraud solution with a 100% SLA guarantee. The world’s largest brands trust us to protect their customer journey while delivering unrivaled customer experience.', 'A breadth of technical aptitude to talk shop to our engineers Ambitious, accountable, and be a self-starter', 'Participate in security conference to increase awareness on online fraud and abuse', 'Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0', 'Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0', 'Nice to haves:', 'Proven track record of successful application of ML to resolve hard problems\xa0', 'Research product workflow change or features that will improve detection and ensure optimal user experience\xa0', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0Startup Experience']

job_title: Assistant Member Faculty - Department Biostatistics & Bioinformatics
job_text: ['', ' Successful candidates must have a Ph.D. in statistics, bioinformatics or related field and relevant research training and experience.', ' We seek candidates who can contribute to the many current clinical and basic science studies at Moffitt, as evidenced by a history of peer-reviewed publications and involvement in grant supported research projects. Preference will be given to applicants with an outstanding record of doing team science or collaborative biostatistics/bioinformatics research with an emphasis in metabolomic mass-spectrometry studies. The candidate is expected to identify and resolve methodological issues that arise in collaborative research, as a major expectation is to identify areas of methodological research in which to engage that will benefit the candidate’s collaborative research.', ' Collaborate on a variety of cancer clinical, population and basic science research projects', ' Collaborate on a variety of cancer clinical, population and basic science research projects Communicate clearly and openly Build relationships to promote a collaborative environment', ' The candidate is expected to identify and resolve methodological issues that arise in collaborative research, as a major expectation is to identify areas of methodological research in which to engage that will benefit the candidate’s collaborative research.', 'Summary', 'Responsibilities', ' Build relationships to promote a collaborative environment', ' Preference will be given to applicants with an outstanding record of doing team science or collaborative biostatistics/bioinformatics research with an emphasis in metabolomic mass-spectrometry studies.', ' We seek candidates who can contribute to the many current clinical and basic science studies at Moffitt, as evidenced by a history of peer-reviewed publications and involvement in grant supported research projects.', ' Communicate clearly and openly', 'The Ideal Candidate', 'Credentials And Qualifications']

['', '• Explore relevant technology stacks to find the best fit for each dataset', 'The Data Engineer collects terabytes of data across all aspects of its operations, from genome sequencing, crop field trials, manufacturing, supply chain, financial transactions and everything in between. There is an enormous need and potential here to do something that has never been done before. We need great people to help transform these complex scientific datasets into innovative software that is deployed across the pipeline, accelerating the pace and quality of all crop system development decisions to unbelievable levels.', 'SKILLS', '• Take pride in software craftsmanship, apply a deep knowledge of algorithms and data structures to continuously improve and innovate', 'We are looking for a Sr. Level Data Engineer', '• A level of comfort with Unit Testing and Test Driven Development methodologies', '• Familiarity with creating and maintaining containerized application deployments with a platform like Docker', '• Pursue opportunities to present our work at relevant technical conferences', 'What you will do is why you should join us:', 'Please send resumes directly to judy@syllogisteks.com', 'No 3rd party agencies please.\xa0Will only employ those who are legally authorized to work in the United States. This is not a position for which sponsorship will be provided. Individuals with temporary visas such as E, F-1, H-1, H-2, L, B, J, or TN or who need sponsorship for work authorization\xa0now or in the future, are not eligible for hire.', '• Work with other top-level talent solving a wide range of complex and unique challenges that have real world impact', '\xa0', '• Experience with stream processing using Apache Kafka', '• Experience data modeling for large scale databases, either relational or NoSQL', '• Proven experience (2 years) building and maintaining data-intensive APIs using a RESTful approach', '• Be a critical senior member of a data engineering team focused on creating distributed analysis capabilities around a large variety of datasets', '• A proven ability to build and maintain cloud based infrastructure on a major cloud provider like AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform', '\xa0At least 2 years experience with Go']

job_title: Researcher - William Masters Research, Friedman School of Nutrition
job_text: ['', 'Familiarity with the scientific basis, policy priorities and institutional arrangements used to advance international agriculture, food systems and nutrition around the world.', ' Master’s degree in a field related to agriculture, food systems and nutrition policy, with 3+ years research experience.  At least 1 year of fieldwork in Africa and/or Asia featuring engagement with national government officials and other stakeholders relating to agriculture, food systems and nutrition policy. Excellence in research project management, data analysis and communications research relating to agriculture, food systems and nutrition in Africa and Asia. Familiarity with the scientific basis, policy priorities and institutional arrangements used to advance international agriculture, food systems and nutrition around the world. High levels of communications skill, organizational and managerial ability, attention to detail, and ability to multi-task particularly when engaging with development agencies and government officials. Ability to interact and effectively collaborate with diverse colleagues, working independently to meet deadlines with efficiency and accuracy. Proficiency in use of software for data management and statistical analysis (Stata or R) as well as research project management and communications in diverse office environments.  ', 'Master’s degree in a field related to agriculture, food systems and nutrition policy, with 3+ years research experience. ', 'Employee Status', 'Job Posting', 'Job', 'Proficiency in use of software for data management and statistical analysis (Stata or R) as well as research project management and communications in diverse office environments. ', 'Experience convening stakeholder groups, including organization of in-person workshops.', 'At least 1 year of fieldwork in Africa and/or Asia featuring engagement with national government officials and other stakeholders relating to agriculture, food systems and nutrition policy.', 'Organization', 'An employee in this position must complete all appropriate background checks at the time of hire, promotion, or transfer.', 'Ability to interact and effectively collaborate with diverse colleagues, working independently to meet deadlines with efficiency and accuracy.', 'This is a limited term position ending September 1, 2021. This is a grant funded position and is not eligible for severance pay.', ' Experience working with food prices, food markets and consumer behavior. Experience convening stakeholder groups, including organization of in-person workshops. Experience in diverse domains of the food system, from agriculture and the environment to human health. Interest and ability to move from fieldwork to doctoral-level research. ', 'Interest and ability to move from fieldwork to doctoral-level research.', 'Experience working with food prices, food markets and consumer behavior.', 'Basic Requirements', 'Primary Location', 'Experience in diverse domains of the food system, from agriculture and the environment to human health.', 'Equal Opportunity Employer – minority/females/veterans/disability/sexual orientation/gender identity.', 'Excellence in research project management, data analysis and communications research relating to agriculture, food systems and nutrition in Africa and Asia.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'High levels of communications skill, organizational and managerial ability, attention to detail, and ability to multi-task particularly when engaging with development agencies and government officials.']

['', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'Track record of collaborating across disciplines (design, engineering) to drive change into products; must be able to work independently as well as part of a cohesive team.', 'Research Planning: Develop and maintain research plans and drive data into decisions across the product lifecycle.', ' Communication: Effectively communicate research strategies, methodologies and insights to peers, partners, and stakeholders throughout the organization.', 'Research Planning: Develop and maintain research plans and drive data into decisions across the product lifecycle. Delivery: Provide actionable insights as an outcome of research activities and drive those insights into product and design plans with peers in the PM and Design organizations. Communication: Effectively communicate research strategies, methodologies and insights to peers, partners, and stakeholders throughout the organization. Evangelism: Be a key partner in ensuring product success by representing the value of design research to Product Managers and Engineers throughout the organization. Global Alignment: Work closely with design counterparts in global teams to align research activities and execution consistency. ', ' ', '\xa0 ', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and proven experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases. The opportunity is huge, with $60 billion spent every year on real estate commissions and the industry is ripe for change.\xa0 So far, we’ve helped over 80,000 people buy and sell homes, saving them over $200M in fees, and doing it all with a high customer satisfaction score.', 'Job Requirements', 'AWS experience is a plus', 'Develop and maintain complex SQL that executes hundreds of custom business rules and outputs agent compensation data', 'Develop and unit test assigned features to meet product requirements', 'Ensure 100% accuracy in everything you do - make sure that all code and processes are fully tested and verified before running in production', 'Experience in database technologies (Postgres,RedShift etc.) (7+ years experience)', 'Ability to communicate with both technical and non-technical users', 'Programming language experience (Python, Java, etc) (1+ years experience)', 'Create a new architecture around agent compensation that will allow for configurable business rules and will scale to meet our growing employee base', 'Work with a cross-department team to review, define and implement the Redfin Agent Compensation SystemDevelop and maintain complex SQL that executes hundreds of custom business rules and outputs agent compensation dataEnsure 100% accuracy in everything you do - make sure that all code and processes are fully tested and verified before running in productionDevelop, implement and tune ETL processes to support downstream applicationsCreate code that meets design specifications, follows standards and is easy to maintainDevelop and unit test assigned features to meet product requirementsCreate a new architecture around agent compensation that will allow for configurable business rules and will scale to meet our growing employee base', 'To make sure we hire the most qualified people, we’ve designed a multi-step selection process which may include interviews, a homework assignment, and a reference check. We’re excited to get to know you and hope you’re ready to give this opportunity everything you’ve got!', 'Job Responsibilities', 'PM skills such as planning, prioritization, requirements gathering and communication across teams', 'Develop, implement and tune ETL processes to support downstream applications', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Create code that meets design specifications, follows standards and is easy to maintain', 'Working knowledge of data modeling and data quality techniques', 'Work with a cross-department team to review, define and implement the Redfin Agent Compensation System', "As Senior Data Engineer - Agent Compensation on the Data Engineering Team, you will be part of the team that owns Redfin's data automation platform, data warehouse, and agent pay system. This role will own the Redfin Agent Compensation System from end to end.\xa0 In this role, you will work closely with Real Estate Operations, Finance, HR and Analytics to review, define and implement compensation policy. This is a highly visible and highly accountable role and will require a PM mindset along with the technical skill of a Data Engineer.", 'Redfin is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce.', 'Experience working with GIT/Docker/Jenkins is a plus']

The Scientist I is responsible for the development and evaluation of new reagents and testing new antibodies for use in flow cytometry applications. The Associate is responsible for routine, accurate and timely testing of experimental samples according to standard protocols and operating procedures. The ability to execute scientific experiments of moderate scope is key. The successful candidate is expected to set up and execute these experiments, be detail oriented, skilled at data analysis and trouble shooting and will be accountable for preparing and presenting data at lab meetings. The Scientist I will prioritize daily workload and work with some supervision.The associate will participate in the analysis and review of data, report results, and complete all required documentation and database entries. ['', 'New York – New York', 'With great funding and the ability to work through their own projects, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and deep learning techniques that focus on helping people in the health care space. As a senior data scientist you will provide technical expertise and client-facing abilities.', 'Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of machine learning frameworksPrior exposure to putting models into productionHave a background in Health care', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.', 'You will be working client-facing', 'THE ROLE', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', 'This is an opportunity for an experienced Data Scientist to come into a well-established start-up and work on strategic and technical work. You would be working hands-on, developing cutting edge machine learning models as well as speaking directly to clients.', 'Senior Data Scientist', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. You will also need a background in the health care space, as to have an understanding of their clients.\xa0', 'THE BENEFITS', 'You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.', 'Have a background in Health care', 'This is a well-established start up that just received over $150m in funding. They work in the healthtech space and deliver machine learning solutions to patient-focused needs across the health care industry.', '\xa0', '$170,000', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.You will be working client-facing', 'Please register your interest by sending your résumé to Elizabeth Sobel via the Apply link on this page.', 'Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of machine learning frameworks', 'An extremely competitive base salary of $170,000 plus benefits', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'Prior exposure to putting models into production']

['', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee may occasionally be exposed to fumes or airborne particles.\xa0The employee may be exposed to moving equipment, vehicles and mechanical parts.\xa0The noise level in the work office environment is typically mild.\xa0The environment on the aircraft during flight operations may become noisy and tiring. The employee must be capable of performing all duties in a technical / scientific setting including offices, laboratories, shops, and aircraft maintenance facilities as well as on the aircraft / observatory, both while on the ground and during flights.\xa0The employee may need to lift and / or move up to 50 pounds.\xa0', 'Please apply online using the link provided below and include the following attachments:', 'Application cover letterCurriculum VitaeList of publicationsShort research statement (max 4 pages)', 'Evidence of potential for high level of achievement as an independent researcher.', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Candidates should include the contact information for two references in the cover letter. Please send all application materials no later than November 30, 2020. Application reviews and candidate interviews will begin immediately.', 'PhD in Astronomy, or related field', 'Essential Duties/Responsibilities:', 'Evolution of Planetary Systems: infer the physical sizes, atmospheric structures, and chemical compositions of planets, comets, and asteroids; monitor temporal and spatial changes of planetary atmospheres in our Solar System as analogs to exoplanets; determine the molecular composition of comets as a possible source of the Earth’s oceans and organics.', 'Successful candidates may spend up to 20% of their time supporting the operation of the SOFIA observatory. Tasks may include (but are not limited to) reviewing proposals, analyzing calibration data, assessing instrument performance, planning and scheduling observations, representing SOFIA at conferences and workshops, and supporting in-flight observations.', 'Experience in astronomical programming (Python or similar).Evidence of potential for high level of achievement as an independent researcher.Ability to work as a team member to accomplish goals.', 'USRA is an Equal Opportunity Employer: Minorities / Females / Protected Veterans / Disabled / Sexual Orientation / Gender Identity.', 'Birth of Stars and Planets: determine the role of magnetic fields, turbulence, and feedback in star and planet formation; determine the composition and dynamics of protoplanetary disks to trace water to habitable zones and determine disk masses.Origins of Life: investigate the cosmic synthesis of molecules and particles necessary to create and sustain life; compile inventory of water and organics in protostars to understand chemical pathways from simple molecules to prebiotic species.Physics of the Distant Universe: calibrate high-redshift galaxies by detailed examination of nearby analogs, specifically, by measuring far-infrared lines and magnetic fields in local star forming regions, the galactic center, and nearby galaxies.Evolution of Planetary Systems: infer the physical sizes, atmospheric structures, and chemical compositions of planets, comets, and asteroids; monitor temporal and spatial changes of planetary atmospheres in our Solar System as analogs to exoplanets; determine the molecular composition of comets as a possible source of the Earth’s oceans and organics.', 'The positions are for a period of two years, with a possible third-year extension contingent on performance and funding.', 'Physics of the Distant Universe: calibrate high-redshift galaxies by detailed examination of nearby analogs, specifically, by measuring far-infrared lines and magnetic fields in local star forming regions, the galactic center, and nearby galaxies.', 'List of publications', 'Experience in astronomical programming (Python or similar).', 'Working Conditions:', 'Successful candidates will use data from SOFIA’s suite of instruments, which do polarimetry, spectroscopy, and imaging in the mid- and far-infrared. They will also be encouraged to develop research ideas that utilize the SOFIA data archive.', 'Travel:', 'Position Summary:', 'Experience with astronomical observing and/or modeling.Good track record of publications in leading scientific journals.', 'Applications are invited for a postdoctoral position to work on infrared science using data obtained from the Stratospheric Observatory for Infrared Astronomy (SOFIA) at NASA Ames Research Center, Moffett Field, California.', 'www.usra.edu', 'Experience with astronomical observing and/or modeling.', 'Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:\xa0', 'Successful candidates will use data from SOFIA’s suite of instruments, which do polarimetry, spectroscopy, and imaging in the mid- and far-infrared. They will also be encouraged to develop research ideas that utilize the SOFIA data archive.Applicants must have a Ph.D. in astronomy or a closely related field as well as previous experience in astronomical observing and/or modeling leading to publications in refereed journals. Experience in infrared observing and/or modeling is highly desirable but not required.Successful candidates may spend up to 20% of their time supporting the operation of the SOFIA observatory. Tasks may include (but are not limited to) reviewing proposals, analyzing calibration data, assessing instrument performance, planning and scheduling observations, representing SOFIA at conferences and workshops, and supporting in-flight observations.', 'This job primarily operates in a professional office environment. This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, etc. Extensive online usage. While performing the duties of this job, the employee is frequently required to stand; walk; sit, use hands.\xa0Keyboarding for large time spans each day will be a significant part of this position.', 'Funding is available for travel to conferences, visiting collaborators, equipment, and publications.', 'Education:', 'Applicants must have a Ph.D. in astronomy or a closely related field as well as previous experience in astronomical observing and/or modeling leading to publications in refereed journals. Experience in infrared observing and/or modeling is highly desirable but not required.', 'Applicants should apply to the posting at USRA Careers and include a letter of interest, resume, or curriculum vita. Additional information on USRA can be found at www.usra.edu.\xa0', 'Origins of Life: investigate the cosmic synthesis of molecules and particles necessary to create and sustain life; compile inventory of water and organics in protostars to understand chemical pathways from simple molecules to prebiotic species.', 'Application cover letter', 'Curriculum Vitae', 'The postdoctoral scholars will work in one or more of the following scientific areas:', 'Ability to work as a team member to accomplish goals.', 'Experience:', 'Good track record of publications in leading scientific journals.', 'These positions are stationed at NASA Ames Research Center Moffett Field, CA. The successful candidates will be expected to travel to conferences and possibly participate in observing runs aboard SOFIA.', 'Short research statement (max 4 pages)', 'Birth of Stars and Planets: determine the role of magnetic fields, turbulence, and feedback in star and planet formation; determine the composition and dynamics of protoplanetary disks to trace water to habitable zones and determine disk masses.']

job_title: Senior Scientific Researcher, Oncology Biomarker Development
job_text: ['', 'Hematology:', 'Responsible for translational research to enable the development of biomarkers and assays for use in the clinical development of our candidate medicines. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Job Facts', 'SCHEDULE', 'You will have an intimate knowledge of, and extensive hands-on experience with, relevant molecular (e.g. PCR, DNA manipulation) and cell biology techniques (e.g. primary and derivative cell culture and transfection).', 'A proven track record, including authorship of and / or contributions to, publications in top tier journals is required.', 'Primary Role', 'Signaling: ', 'Hematology: The major responsibility will focus on the lab-based identification and validation of the mechanisms conferring sensitivity and resistance to many of Genentech/Roche’s Early and Late Stage assets in hematologic malignancies. Expertise in oncology, signaling, cancer immunotherapy and translational research is highly desirable. The ideal candidate will also be familiar with methodologies and platforms used for analyzing high-content NGS data. The successful candidate will be involved in cross-functional project teams in the hematology disease areas. The candidate will review available biomarker data from clinical studies, develop, and execute experimental plans supporting reverse translational research. ', 'Successful candidates will have a BS, MS degree, and at least 6 years of hands-on laboratory research experience.', 'Candidates must have excellent communication skills and the ability to work with scientists and associates from multiple laboratories, disciplines and departments.', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'Cancer Immunotherapy (CIT): Qualified candidate will participate in the discovery and investigation of novel drug targets in the therapeutic area of tumor inflammation and immunology. Using state of the art techniques and technologies, he/she will be involved in the purification of immune cells for in-vitro cell culture, T cell functional assays including in vitro stimulation, multi-color flow cytometry, and investigation of new molecular pathways using cellular and molecular techniques to investigate receptor/ligand interactions for potential therapeutic utility. Direct experience with animal models of immune response and/or anti-tumor immunity is preferred.', 'Successful candidates will have a BS, MS degree, and at least 6 years of hands-on laboratory research experience.You will have an intimate knowledge of, and extensive hands-on experience with, relevant molecular (e.g. PCR, DNA manipulation) and cell biology techniques (e.g. primary and derivative cell culture and transfection).Preferred candidates will have experience in oncology, development of biomarker assays, and their implementation in clinical trials.Candidates must have excellent communication skills and the ability to work with scientists and associates from multiple laboratories, disciplines and departments.A proven track record, including authorship of and / or contributions to, publications in top tier journals is required.', 'This is a local hire only designated position, as relocation assistance is not available for the position', 'Signaling:  Substantial expertise in oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, cancer immunotherapy and translational research is highly desirable. The ideal candidate will also be proficient with in vitro methodologies used to assess candidate mechanisms of resistance and familiar with computational methodologies and platforms used for generating and analyzing high-content NGS data including single-cell RNASeq. Experiences with NGS, digital PCR, DNA methylation analysis, strong data sciences, statistical / bioinformatic analysis and programming skill a plus. ', 'Requirements', 'Experimental strategies will include the application of state of the art molecular and genomic technologies to analyze clinical samples.', 'Responsible for translational research to enable the development of biomarkers and assays for use in the clinical development of our candidate medicines. Experimental strategies will include the application of state of the art molecular and genomic technologies to analyze clinical samples.Specific responsibilities will include processing and analyzing clinical trial samples, data analysis, and presentation, and contributing to experimental design and planning.', 'The Position', 'Cancer Immunotherapy (CIT): ', 'JOB TYPE', 'Who We Are', 'Specific responsibilities will include processing and analyzing clinical trial samples, data analysis, and presentation, and contributing to experimental design and planning.', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'Preferred candidates will have experience in oncology, development of biomarker assays, and their implementation in clinical trials.']

Train and mentor laboratory colleagues. Coordinate/submit invoice information for billing; track and manage scope changes/change order quotes. This position works with and handles hazardous materials and wastes at client site. This person has the appropriate qualifications to read, understand, apply and communicate written and verbal information regarding handling and managing hazardous wastes. Training is required within six months of assuming duty and once a year thereafter. He/She is also responsible for recognizing emergency situations concerning hazardous materials and wastes. Provide laboratory upkeep (supplies, chemical, cleanliness and safety), if needed.', 'NMR* ', 'Write Aps, SOPs, and similar documents. ', 'GC/MS* ', 'HPLC* ', 'Perform routine and non-routine testing of raw materials, intermediate, and final products. ', 'Basic wet chemistry* ', 'Apex Systems has a great opportunity for a Research Scientist to work in the High Point, NC area with our client.\xa0 This will be a perm placement position!\xa0\xa0 ', 'HPLC* GC* GC/MS* FTIR* Titrations (manual and automated)* Basic wet chemistry* NMR* TLC* XRPD* Laser diffraction particle size* Working knowledge of other analytical equipment common to the pharmaceutical industry* ', 'Conduct analytical methods development, validation, and transfers. ', 'Coordinate/submit invoice information for billing; track and manage scope changes/change order quotes. ', 'FTIR* ']

['', 'Qualifications', 'The Field HEOR Scientist is a field-based position.The position has two main responsibilities, conducting health economics and outcomes research as a part of a cross-functional matrix team in an internal-facing role, and leading the medical interface with key access customers in a field-facing role.The HEOR Scientist will be responsible for collaborating on the development and implementation of the US HEOR strategy, plans, and research.They work closely with the home office medical teams to develop, interpret, and disseminate data/information assessing the medical value of BMS assets and must have experience executing all phases of the research process.The HEOR Scientist will be required to direct research strategy to ensure BMS answers key questions in the health care marketplace driven by direct payer insights in accordance with Company policies and in collaboration with the home office medical matrix team.In addition, the HEOR Scientist will lead Health Economics and Outcomes Research for any given therapeutic area.The HEOR Scientist will concentrate their field-facing activities on specific accounts which include regional managed care accounts, and key integrated delivery networks in order to facilitate appropriate patient access, medical policy, coverage, and reimbursement for all BMS portfolio assets.They are responsible for developing sustainable customer relationships and discussing comprehensive scientific, health economic, epidemiology, and quality of life information.The HEOR Scientist will work closely with the commercial We are responsible for the platform that collects data from a large, diverse, worldwide pool of workers. This data is foundation to evaluate and train AI (Artificial Intelligence) and ML (Machine Learning) models across Microsoft. We are one of the top 3 AI labelling platforms world-wide and aspire to grow by a magnitude in coming years.\u202fYou will find a great mix of R&D opportunities as well as engineering opportunities around big data and have opportunity to work with world class data scientists. ['', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. Commercial experience with hands on experience putting deep learning projects into production is a must,', 'This is an opportunity for a pure Deep Learning\xa0Scientist\xa0to cut their teeth in a data-first fast paced environment where they are designing unique infrastructure in the world of consumer goods. If you are looking for the chance to take your skills to the next level and work in an environment where your work with produce actionable commercial result – this is the role for you.', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.', '$100,000-120,000 + excellent benefits package', 'THE ROLE', 'Deep Learning Scientist', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', 'With great funding and the ability to work through their own projects, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and deep learning techniques on both the research and development side. As a deep learning engineer on this team, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying\xa0analytical\xa0techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects.', 'Initially you’ll be brought to work in hands on deep learning projects, with a real chance to make an interesting and immediate impact.You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.You will be working with other engineers and the computer vision team on a data driven approach to solving problems on a project to project base.', 'THE COMPANY', 'As a Deep Learning Scientist, you’ll find yourself working closely with leaders in machine learning and AI research. This is a large,\xa0multi-billion dollar company that develops products that you see on store shelves every single day.', 'THE BENEFITS', 'Cincinnati, OH', 'Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of deep learning frameworksPrior exposure to putting models into productionHave a background in computer science, statistics, or engineeringPrevious work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning', 'A base salary of $100,000-120,000', 'You will be using complex algorithms to lead this cutting-edge field.', '\xa0', 'Please register your interest by sending your\xa0résumé\xa0to Elizabeth\xa0Sobel\xa0via the Apply link on this page.', 'Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of deep learning frameworks', 'You will be working with other engineers and the computer vision team on a data driven approach to solving problems on a project to project base.', 'Have a background in computer science, statistics, or engineering', 'Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'Prior exposure to putting models into production']

job_title: Data Engineer, Alexa AI Analytics Platform - Data Warehouse
job_text: ['', 'The Data Engineer', ' 3+ years of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly-optimized SQL queries across large data sets', " 3+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and building ETL pipelines Experience in SQL Bachelor's degree or higher in a quantitative/technical field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering) 3+ years of relevant experience in one of the following areas: Data engineering, database engineering, business intelligence or business analytics 3+ years of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly-optimized SQL queries across large data sets Demonstrable experience in scripting languages (Python, Perl, Ruby) and Excel Experience in data modeling, ETL development, and Data warehousing Experience with massively parallel processing (MPP) databases (data warehouse and data lake) Experience with Tableau, Matillion, and AWS services (Redshift, S3, AWS Glue, EMR, DynamoDB) Experience with cloud data platforms and big data solutions Knowledge of distributed systems as it pertains to data storage and computing", ' Has knowledge of recent advances in distributed systems (e.g. MapReduce, MPP architectures, and NoSQL databases). You are proficient in a broad range of data design approaches and know when it is appropriate to use them (and when it is not).', ' Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and building ETL pipelines', ' Writing code that a Data Engineer or Software Development Engineer unfamiliar with the system can understand.', ' Works with engineers to develop efficient data querying and modeling infrastructure.', ' Experience with cloud data platforms and big data solutions', ' Can create coherent Logical Data Models that drive physical design.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Collaboration with colleagues from multidisciplinary science, engineering and business backgrounds.', ' Has knowledge of recent advances in distributed systems (e.g. MapReduce, MPP architectures, and NoSQL databases). You are proficient in a broad range of data design approaches and know when it is appropriate to use them (and when it is not). Knowledge of engineering and operational excellence best practices. Can make enhancements that improve data processes (e.g., data auditing solutions, management of manually maintained tables, automating, ad-hoc or manual operation steps). Works with engineers to develop efficient data querying and modeling infrastructure. Understands how to make appropriate data trade-offs. Can balance customer requirements with technology requirements. Knows when to re-use code. Is judicious about introducing dependencies. Writing code that a Data Engineer or Software Development Engineer unfamiliar with the system can understand. Can create coherent Logical Data Models that drive physical design. Delivers pragmatic solutions. You do things with the proper level of complexity the first time (or at least minimize incidental complexity). Understands how to be efficient with resource usage (e.g., system hardware, data storage, query optimization, AWS infrastructure etc.) Collaboration with colleagues from multidisciplinary science, engineering and business backgrounds. Communicate proposals and results in a clear manner backed by data and coupled with actionable conclusions to drive business decisions', ' Experience with Tableau, Matillion, and AWS services (Redshift, S3, AWS Glue, EMR, DynamoDB)', 'Company', ' Experience working with enterprise reporting systems, data analytics.', ' Communicate proposals and results in a clear manner backed by data and coupled with actionable conclusions to drive business decisions', ' Knowledge of distributed systems as it pertains to data storage and computing', ' Experience in SQL', ' Master’s degree in a quantitative/technical field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering) Experience working with enterprise reporting systems, data analytics. Experience working as an Analytics Engineer or Data Scientist working with cross functional teams.', ' Master’s degree in a quantitative/technical field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering)', ' Demonstrable experience in scripting languages (Python, Perl, Ruby) and Excel', ' Understands how to make appropriate data trade-offs. Can balance customer requirements with technology requirements. Knows when to re-use code. Is judicious about introducing dependencies.', ' Understands how to be efficient with resource usage (e.g., system hardware, data storage, query optimization, AWS infrastructure etc.)', 'Description', ' Knowledge of engineering and operational excellence best practices. Can make enhancements that improve data processes (e.g., data auditing solutions, management of manually maintained tables, automating, ad-hoc or manual operation steps).', ' Delivers pragmatic solutions. You do things with the proper level of complexity the first time (or at least minimize incidental complexity).', ' 3+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role', ' Experience working as an Analytics Engineer or Data Scientist working with cross functional teams.', " Bachelor's degree or higher in a quantitative/technical field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering)", ' Experience in data modeling, ETL development, and Data warehousing', ' Experience with massively parallel processing (MPP) databases (data warehouse and data lake)', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' 3+ years of relevant experience in one of the following areas: Data engineering, database engineering, business intelligence or business analytics']

['', ' Familiarity with data quality automation.', ' Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include: Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS. Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows. Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use', ' Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS.', ' 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources.', 'Company', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields.', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture.', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture. Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL. Proven experience with MPP databases. Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar. Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc. Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines. Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague. A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy.', ' Proven experience with MPP databases.', ' Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields. 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources. Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis. Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy. Familiarity with data quality automation. Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment. Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis.', ' Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind', 'Description', ' Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL.', ' Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions', ' Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications', ' Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines.', ' A real passion for technology. ['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'About Our Team', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.']
