['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'About Our Team', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.']

job_title: Data Science and Business Intelligence Engineering Manager
job_text: ['', ' Strong attention to detail', ' Understanding of relevant statistical measures such as confidence intervals, significance of error measurements, development and evaluation data sets, etc.', ' Ability to think creatively and solve problems', ' Experience with various machine learning techniques and parameters that affect their performance', ' Experience in Perl, Python, or another scripting language; command line usage', ' Analyze the customer issues at individual and aggregate level to draw key insights and inform programs and business prioritizations', ' Experience with statistical modelling / machine learning', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Build predictive models and framework to compute down-stream impact as output of our AI systems', 'Company', ' Ability to develop experimental and analytic plans for data modeling processes, use of strong baselines, ability to accurately determine cause and effect relations', ' Build and release models that elevate the customer experience and track impact over time', ' Exceptional level of organization', ' Work with engineers to develop efficient data querying infrastructure for both offline and online use cases', ' Ensure data quality throughout all stages of acquisition and processing, including such areas as data sourcing/collection, ground truth generation, normalization, transformation, cross-lingual alignment/mapping, etc.', ' Collaborate with colleagues from science, engineering, product management and business backgrounds within Alexa AI as well as key stakeholders across Alexa.', ' Master’s or PhD in a relevant field 5+ years experience with various data analysis, predictive modeling, and visualization tools 3+ years of managing data scientists, business intelligence engineers, language engineers and/or computational linguists Experience in Perl, Python, or another scripting language; command line usage Experience with various machine learning techniques and parameters that affect their performance', ' Track record of diving into data to discover hidden patterns and of conducting error/deviation analysis Ability to develop experimental and analytic plans for data modeling processes, use of strong baselines, ability to accurately determine cause and effect relations Understanding of relevant statistical measures such as confidence intervals, significance of error measurements, development and evaluation data sets, etc. The motivation to achieve results in a fast-paced environment. Experience with statistical modelling / machine learning Strong attention to detail Exceptional level of organization Comfortable working in a fast paced, highly collaborative, dynamic work environment Ability to think creatively and solve problems', ' Build/Scale workflows to compute, process and serve KPIs in all Alexa domains and languages', ' Master’s or PhD in a relevant field', ' 3+ years of managing data scientists, business intelligence engineers, language engineers and/or computational linguists', ' 5+ years experience with various data analysis, predictive modeling, and visualization tools', 'Description', ' Comfortable working in a fast paced, highly collaborative, dynamic work environment', ' Manage workflow tools and processes to ensure they are efficient, high quality, and scalable.', ' Present proposals and results in a clear manner backed by data and coupled with actionable conclusions', ' Own data for customer-facing features, including launch go/no-go metrics for new features and accuracy metrics for existing features.', ' Understand business requirements and map them to technical requirements Build/Scale workflows to compute, process and serve KPIs in all Alexa domains and languages Build predictive models and framework to compute down-stream impact as output of our AI systems Manage workflow tools and processes to ensure they are efficient, high quality, and scalable. Own data for customer-facing features, including launch go/no-go metrics for new features and accuracy metrics for existing features. Ensure data quality throughout all stages of acquisition and processing, including such areas as data sourcing/collection, ground truth generation, normalization, transformation, cross-lingual alignment/mapping, etc. Analyze the customer issues at individual and aggregate level to draw key insights and inform programs and business prioritizations Build and release models that elevate the customer experience and track impact over time Collaborate with colleagues from science, engineering, product management and business backgrounds within Alexa AI as well as key stakeholders across Alexa. Present proposals and results in a clear manner backed by data and coupled with actionable conclusions Work with engineers to develop efficient data querying infrastructure for both offline and online use cases', 'You Will', ' Track record of diving into data to discover hidden patterns and of conducting error/deviation analysis', ' Understand business requirements and map them to technical requirements', ' The motivation to achieve results in a fast-paced environment.', 'Preferred Qualifications']

Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. ['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'About Our Team', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.']

job_title: We are looking for Site Reliability Engineer -NJ
job_text: ['', 'Support Data Scientist in identifying required data elements to predict system outages or service failuresYou can reach me at', 'Identify components of the application septible to service failure, performance, stability, and scalability issues.', 'Develop metrics, monitoring, and alerting to observe the health of the production system.', 'Be proactive in anticipating production issues - outages, slowness, processing delays, errors, and failures', 'Identify data elements of the application that have relation with service failure, performance, stability, and scalability issues.', 'Develop or implement visual tools for technical and business teams to observe system health.']

job_title: Senior Cloud Data Engineer with PostgreSQL, CockroachDB

job_text: ['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'About Our Team', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.']

You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'About Our Team', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed.
